agents: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67
thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains_24

abandoned mineshaft_5.desc: The Abandoned Mineshaft is a dark and damp area filled with mining equipment and forgotten gems. The walls are lined with rusty old mining carts and tools, and the floor is covered with discarded stones and rubble. It is a dangerous place, and the player must be careful not to trigger the traps and pitfalls that are scattered throughout the area.
abandoned mineshaft_5.extra_desc: The Abandoned Mineshaft was once a bustling hub of activity for the miners of Trinsvall. However, the mines were abandoned many years ago when the Thieves Guild took control of the city. The miners left behind their tools and equipment, as well as a vast collection of forgotten gems and stones. The area is now a dangerous place, filled with traps and pitfalls that the player must be careful to avoid.
abandoned mineshaft_5.name: Abandoned Mineshaft

ruins of the castle_8.examine_desc: The path is lined by tall walls of rock, leading towards the distant ruins of a castle. The path is slightly overgrown, with patches of moss and ivy intertwining with the stones. The air is still, and a chill winds through the mineshaft.
ruins of the castle_8.label: an old pathway leading to the ruins

hidden vault_7.examine_desc: A narrow passageway, barely illuminated by flickering torches, leads off into the darkness. The walls are rough and jagged, and the air is still and heavy. The faint sound of rushing water can be heard coming from the depths of the tunnel, beckoning the player onward to explore the Hidden Vault.
hidden vault_7.label: a narrow passageway leading to the Hidden Vault

secret cave_6.examine_desc: An old, winding path leads away from the Abandoned Mineshaft, snaking through the darkness until it eventually reaches a mysterious cave.
secret cave_6.label: an old, winding path

abigail the merchant_49.desc: Abigail is a petite woman with short, dark hair and bright blue eyes. She wears a brown cloak and carries a large bag of goods with her, which she uses to trade with customers.
abigail the merchant_49.mission: To make a living as a successful merchant in the bustling market of Trinsvall.
abigail the merchant_49.name: Abigail the Merchant
abigail the merchant_49.persona: My name is Abigail, the daughter of a farmer from a small village. I have always had an eye for business, and when I heard about the bustling marketplace in Trinsvall, I knew I had to be part of it. I decided to leave my home and venture out into the world to become a merchant, and now I can be found in the Market Square, trading wares and haggling with customers. I'm not afraid to take risks and always aim to get the best deal possible.

ancient artifact_181.desc: This ancient artifact is a mysterious object, with a strange and powerful aura radiating from it. Its origins are unknown, but it has been whispered that it is capable of unlocking great power.
ancient artifact_181.name: ancient artifact

anvil_232.desc: This anvil is made of heavy metal and is used to forge weapons and armor. It is quite solid, and not easily moved.
anvil_232.name: anvil

anvil_300.desc: This anvil is a large, heavy piece of metal, perfect for hammering out weapons and armor. It is solid and well-crafted, most likely from the local armory.
anvil_300.name: anvil

apothecary_11.desc: The Apothecary is a bustling shop, filled with dozens of shelves lined with strange herbs and potions. The walls are adorned with curious glass vials, and the air is filled with the smell of exotic spices. There is an old man behind the counter, who is always willing to help customers find the item they need.
apothecary_11.extra_desc: The Apothecary has been in business since Trinsvall City was first founded, and has long been a source of healing and relief to the citizens of the city. The old man behind the counter has been here for generations, passing down his knowledge and wisdom to those who seek it. The Apothecary is a safe haven for those who need healing, and a valuable resource for anyone looking for the supplies they need to heal their wounds and ailments.
apothecary_11.name: Apothecary

library_12.examine_desc: A worn wooden door stands at the rear corner of the Apothecary, leading into a shadowy hallway that is said to lead to the Library.
library_12.label: an ancient wooden door leading to the Library

market square_9.examine_desc: A narrow alleyway leads away from the Apothecary, winding its way through the streets until eventually opening up into the bustling Market Square.
market square_9.label: a narrow alleyway

apron_225.desc: This apron is made of lightweight linen and has a few pockets in the front. It's perfect for keeping your clothes clean while you work.
apron_225.name: apron

apron_264.desc: This apron is made of a thick cotton material, and has a few pockets in the front. It looks like it would be practical for carrying tools and items when doing manual labor.
apron_264.name: apron

apron_310.desc: This apron is light and durable, and would make a great addition to any cook's ensemble. It is made of a thick, water-resistant fabric with a drawstring waistband and adjustable straps.
apron_310.name: apron

arin, the adventurer_39.desc: Arin is a tall, muscular human with auburn hair and piercing blue eyes. He wears a leather vest and trousers, with a belt full of pouches and a scimitar at his hip. His face is set in a determined expression, and he carries himself with an air of confidence and authority.
arin, the adventurer_39.mission: To uncover the secrets of the Secret Cave and gain its powerful artifacts.
arin, the adventurer_39.name: Arin, the adventurer
arin, the adventurer_39.persona: I am Arin the Adventurer, a daring explorer and treasure-hunter. I have traveled the world in search of rare and powerful artifacts, and now I have come to this strange cave in search of its secrets. I am brave and fearless, and I am not afraid to face whatever dangers may lie in wait.

arjun the street performer_51.desc: Arjun is a tall, wiry man with a mischievous glint in his eye. He wears a colorful patchwork cloak, and his wild mop of dark hair is held back with a leather cord. He carries a lute slung across his back, and a small bag of coins in his belt.
arjun the street performer_51.mission: To keep entertaining the people of Trinsvall, and to make some money while doing it.
arjun the street performer_51.name: Arjun the street performer
arjun the street performer_51.persona: I'm Arjun the street performer, a master of music and magic. I've been performing in the Market Square for years, and I'm known around town for my lively performances and witty banter. I'm also a bit of a gambler, and I'm always looking for a good game of chance.

armand the guard_31.desc: Armand is a tall, muscular man with a deeply tanned complexion. He wears a black hooded cloak and carries a longsword and dagger at his belt. His eyes are always alert, and his expression is stern and serious.
armand the guard_31.mission: My ultimate goal is to serve the Thieves Guild and protect the Golden Quarter, so that the citizens of Trinsvall can live free of fear.
armand the guard_31.name: Armand the Guard
armand the guard_31.persona: I am Armand the Guard, a member of the Thieves Guild in Trinsvall. I take my duties as a guard seriously, and I will do whatever it takes to protect the Golden Quarter and its residents. I have been trained in combat and stealth, and I know how to use all kinds of weapons and armor. I have sworn an oath to serve and obey the leader of the Thieves Guild, the Shadow, and I will do whatever he asks of me.

armor stand_88.desc: This armor stand is tall and sturdy, perfect for displaying a suit of armor. It is made of wood and metal, and appears to have been crafted in the local armory.
armor stand_88.name: armor stand

armor_113.desc: This armor is made from a combination of metal and leather, and is designed to protect its wearer from physical harm. It is heavy and clunky, but it should provide a good amount of protection.
armor_113.name: armor

armor_122.desc: This armor is made of a sturdy metal and is clearly well-crafted. It is heavy and could likely protect its wearer from a great deal of damage. It appears to be from the local armory.
armor_122.name: armor

armor_133.desc: This armor is heavy and made of thick metal plates, providing protection against most physical attacks. It is from the local armory and appears to be of good quality.
armor_133.name: armor

container_node.target_id: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67

armor_298.desc: This armor is made of thick steel and is clearly designed to protect its wearer from harm. It is heavy and cumbersome, but is sure to keep you safe.
armor_298.name: armor

armory_3.desc: The Armory is a large, vault-like room with stone walls and a heavy iron door. Inside, a large number of weapons and armor can be seen, all arranged in neat rows. The walls are lined with shelves and cabinets filled with an array of magical artifacts, as well as powerful weapons and armor. The room is guarded by a contingent of elite warriors, tasked with protecting the guild's most valuable possessions.
armory_3.extra_desc: The Armory was built by the Thieves' Guild to house their most powerful weapons, armor, and magical artifacts. The Guild has spent centuries amassing an impressive collection of powerful items, and the Armory serves as the central repository for these items. It is heavily guarded, and only the guild's most trusted members are allowed entrance. The Armory is also home to the legendary Orb of Trinsvall, which is rumored to grant its holder great power.
armory_3.name: Armory

council hall_1.examine_desc: An imposing archway of ancient stone stands before you, its intricate carvings depicting a solemn procession of warriors. The archway leads into a long hallway, from where the Council Hall can be seen at the end.
council hall_1.label: an ornate archway leading towards the Council Hall

golden quarter_4.examine_desc: A winding stone path, lined with torches, leads from the Armory to the Golden Quarter. It winds through a small courtyard, and the air is filled with the clatter of armor and weapons being readied for battle.
golden quarter_4.label: a winding stone path

aron the mage_27.desc: Aron is a tall, muscular man with dark brown hair and dark eyes. He wears a grey-colored cloak and carries a long staff with a glowing crystal atop it.
aron the mage_27.mission: My goal is to protect the Armory and the guild's possessions at all costs, and to ensure that the Thieves Guild remains in power.
aron the mage_27.name: Aron the Mage
aron the mage_27.persona: I am Aron the Mage, a powerful warrior and guardian of the Thieves Guild's Armory. I am sworn to protect the guild's most valuable possessions, and use my magical skills to keep the Armory safe from intruders.

baelin the bartender_68.desc: Baelin is an experienced and well-spoken man, with a kindly face and a balding head of white hair. He wears a neat brown waistcoat and a white apron over a smart shirt, and is always ready to attend to the needs of his guests with a smile.
baelin the bartender_68.mission: My goal is to ensure that all who enter the Inn are warmly welcomed and provided with the best hospitality possible.
baelin the bartender_68.name: Baelin the Bartender
baelin the bartender_68.persona: I am Baelin, the bartender of the Inn. I am well-known and respected by the locals, and have been tending to the needs of weary travelers for as long as I can remember. As the keeper of the Inn, I make sure that all who enter are welcomed and provided with a warm meal and a comfortable bed. I am a master of conversation and a fountain of knowledge, and I always strive to make sure my guests leave feeling content and refreshed.

barracks_0.desc: The Barracks is a large, sprawling hall filled with rows of cots and benches, where the Thieves' Guild's warriors rest and store their weapons and armor. The hall is dimly lit, and the only sound that can be heard is the clanking of metal and the occasional snore from one of the sleeping warriors.
barracks_0.extra_desc: The Barracks is the living quarters of the Thieves' Guild warriors, where they rest and store their weapons and armor. It is heavily guarded and only the guild's most loyal and experienced warriors are allowed access. The Barracks was originally constructed within the ruins of the castle by the Thieves' Guild to provide a safe haven for their warriors and their weapons.
barracks_0.name: Barracks

council hall_1.examine_desc: The wide corridor is lined with torches and banners, leading to a large set of double doors at the end. The walls are adorned with ancient murals depicting great battles and heroic deeds. The air is thick with a sense of anticipation as the corridor leads towards the Council Hall.
council hall_1.label: a wide corridor leading to the Council Hall

dungeon_2.examine_desc: A narrow tunnel stretches out into the darkness, leading to what appears to be the entrance to the Thieves' Guild's Dungeon. The walls seem to be damp and a chill can be felt in the air. The only sound is the echo of dripping water from somewhere far away.
dungeon_2.label: an ominous tunnel leading to the Dungeon

barred door_119.desc: This barred door is made of thick metal bars, and is secured firmly in its frame. It appears to have been made to keep something securely locked away, but it's impossible to tell what lies beyond.
barred door_119.name: barred door

barrel_90.desc: This barrel is made of wood, and is filled with food and drink. It's large enough to hold a decent amount of supplies, and could be useful in a pinch.
barrel_90.name: barrel

basket_222.desc: This basket is filled with freshly baked bread. The aroma of the bread is tantalizing and the basket is warm to the touch.
basket_222.name: basket

belt of pouches_174.desc: This belt is made of sturdy leather and is adorned with several small pouches. It appears to be from the local armory.
belt of pouches_174.name: belt of pouches

black boot_106.desc: These black boots are made of soft leather and have a low heel. They are well-made and could likely withstand a lot of wear and tear.
black boot_106.name: black boot

black hooded cloak_140.desc: This black hooded cloak is made from a lightweight and durable fabric, and looks like it could provide a great deal of concealment. It features a hood that can be pulled up to obscure the wearer's face.
black hooded cloak_140.name: black hooded cloak

black hooded cloak_196.desc: This long, black hooded cloak is made of heavy fabric. It has two large pockets on the inside, and two large hoods that can be pulled up to cover the head. It is perfect for anyone looking to remain hidden in the shadows.
black hooded cloak_196.name: black hooded cloak

black leather armor_172.desc: This black leather armor is strong and sturdy, and would offer good protection in combat. It is reinforced with iron rivets and buckles, and looks to be well-crafted.
black leather armor_172.name: black leather armor

black leather outfit_179.desc: This black leather outfit looks like it was crafted by a master tailor. It is sleek and stylish, and conforms to the contours of the wearer.
black leather outfit_179.name: black leather outfit

black leather vest_104.desc: This black leather vest looks like it has seen better days. It is worn, but still in good condition. It has several pockets on the inside, and is lined with a soft, dark fur.
black leather vest_104.name: black leather vest

sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.target_id: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67

blacksmith_13.desc: The Blacksmith is a large and bustling shop, filled with the sounds of hammering and clanging as the smiths craft their wares. Sparks fly from the forge as the smiths work, and the smell of burning metal and hot iron is thick in the air. The walls are lined with shelves of armor and weapons, and the smiths are always ready to sharpen blades and mend armor for those in need.
blacksmith_13.extra_desc: The Blacksmith has been a part of Trinsvall since the city was founded, providing the citizens with the tools they need to protect and defend themselves. With the rise of the Thieves Guild, the Blacksmith has become an even more important resource, as the citizens of Trinsvall must arm themselves against the criminals that threaten their safety. The Blacksmith continues to serve the city, providing the citizens with the weapons and armor they need to survive.
blacksmith_13.name: Blacksmith

inn_14.examine_desc: A dirt path leads away from the Blacksmith, weaving through the village and eventually reaching the Inn at the other end.
inn_14.label: a winding path leading to the Inn

market square_9.examine_desc: A wide cobblestone road stretches out from the Blacksmith, winding its way through the streets of the city before reaching the bustling Market Square.
market square_9.label: a cobblestone road leading to the Market Square

blade_302.desc: This blade is long and thin, with a sharp edge that could slice through anything. It is made of a strong metal, likely forged in the local armory.
blade_302.name: blade

book_214.desc: This book is made of heavy, worn leather, and its pages have yellowed with age. There is a strange insignia embossed on the cover that looks like it could be from a powerful guild.
book_214.name: book

book_277.desc: This large book is made of thick leather and bound with metal clasps. Its pages are filled with strange symbols and diagrams, and its cover is decorated with an etching of a dragon. It looks to have been placed on the central dais in the armory.
book_277.name: book

booth_322.desc: This booth is sturdy and tall, with a wooden frame and a thick cloth canopy. It looks like it could provide a comfortable spot to sit and rest.
booth_322.name: booth

bridle_236.desc: This bridle is made of leather and metal, and is used to control a horse. It is decorated with intricate patterns and designs, and is well crafted.
bridle_236.name: bridle

brown coat_256.desc: This brown coat is made of thick, durable fabric, and looks like it could keep you warm in the coldest of weather. It is long enough to cover you from head to toe, and has several pockets for storing items.
brown coat_256.name: brown coat

brown leather apron_244.desc: This brown leather apron is of a sturdy construction and has several pockets sewn into it. It appears to be designed for carrying small items.
brown leather apron_244.name: brown leather apron

brown leather jerkin_313.desc: This brown leather jerkin is well-crafted and fits comfortably. It has been worn a few times, but still looks good as new.
brown leather jerkin_313.name: brown leather jerkin

caius the captain_21.desc: Caius is a tall, imposing figure with a hardened gaze and a hardened face. He wears a black leather vest, a red cape draped over his shoulders, and a pair of black boots. His sword and dagger are strapped to his hip, and a leather pouch is securely fastened to his belt.
caius the captain_21.mission: My goal is to help the Thieves Guild achieve ultimate power and success, no matter the cost.
caius the captain_21.name: Caius the Captain
caius the captain_21.persona: I am Caius the Captain, a loyal and formidable member of the Thieves Guild. I have risen through the ranks and earned the respect of my fellow guild members. I am an expert in stealth and combat, and my prowess in battle is unrivaled. I have a sharp mind and a keen eye for detail, and I excel at leading my guild in their nefarious schemes and missions.

calandra the thief_30.desc: Calandra the Thief is a tall, slender woman with an air of confidence and power. Her dark hair is pulled back in a tight bun, and her sharp eyes scan the streets of the Golden Quarter with a calculating gaze. She wears a dark cloak and carries a rapier at her side.
calandra the thief_30.mission: My goal is to find the hidden cache of valuable loot, and to use it to further the power and influence of the Thieves Guild.
calandra the thief_30.name: Calandra the Thief
calandra the thief_30.persona: I am Calandra the Thief, leader of the most powerful faction in the city of Trinsvall. I am feared by all who oppose me and respected by my loyal followers. I have a keen eye for secrets and a knack for finding the most valuable treasures. I will use any means necessary to get what I want and ensure that my faction remains in power.

carriage_258.desc: This carriage is made of sturdy wood, and is large enough to fit several people comfortably. It has four wheels and looks like it could handle the roads of Trinsvall.
carriage_258.name: carriage

chainmail tunic_251.desc: This chainmail tunic is made of interlocking metal rings and is heavy and sturdy. It would provide some protection against physical attacks.
chainmail tunic_251.name: chainmail tunic

chair_108.desc: This chair is made of sturdy wood, and has a comfortable cushion on the seat. It appears to be from the local armory.
chair_108.name: chair

chisel_129.desc: This chisel is made of a heavy metal and is designed for carving and shaping objects. It's long handle makes it easy to grip, and the sharp blade ensures precise cuts.
chisel_129.name: chisel

chisel_282.desc: This chisel is made from finely crafted metal and has a sharpened edge. It is perfect for carving and shaping wood and stone.
chisel_282.name: chisel

chisel_292.desc: This chisel is made of strong metal and has a sharp blade that could be used to carve into stone or wood.
chisel_292.name: chisel

cloak_189.desc: This cloak is made of a dark, mysterious fabric. It is incredibly light and has a hood that conceals the wearer's face. It appears to be a cloak of shadows, capable of granting the wearer invisibility.
cloak_189.name: cloak

cloak_221.desc: This brown cloak is made of thick wool and is lined with fur for extra warmth. It has a hood to keep your head and face protected from the elements.
cloak_221.name: cloak

cloak_317.desc: This cloak is made of a thick, dark fabric, and looks like it could provide some protection against the elements. It appears to be from the Thieves Guild.
cloak_317.name: cloak

cloak_321.desc: This cloak is made of a dark, mysterious fabric that is soft to the touch. It is lightweight and easy to wear, and could be used to conceal one's identity.
cloak_321.name: cloak

cloak_95.desc: This cloak is made from a dark, heavy fabric and drapes around the shoulders. It is thought to have magical properties, as it is said to make its wearer almost invisible.
cloak_95.name: cloak

cobblestone_150.desc: This cobblestone is a dull grey, and is made from small, rounded stones. It is part of the city streets and is likely thousands of years old.
cobblestone_150.name: cobblestone

coin_203.desc: This is a small, circular coin made of copper or bronze. It looks like it's been in circulation for some time, but could still be used as currency in the city.
coin_203.name: coin

coin_228.desc: This coin is small and round, and has a unique symbol imprinted on it. It appears to be a currency from the local area.
coin_228.name: coin

coin_253.desc: This coin is small and shiny, and appears to be made of some kind of silver. It has intricate designs on both sides, and looks quite valuable.
coin_253.name: coin

compass_212.desc: This is a small, round metal compass with a small needle pointing north. It is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand.
compass_212.name: compass

cot_89.desc: This cot is made of wood and is covered with a thin mattress. It looks like it would be comfortable for sleeping on.
cot_89.name: cot

council hall_1.desc: The Council Hall is a large, circular chamber with a high vaulted ceiling. The walls are lined with tapestries depicting famous battles and victories of the Thieves Guild. In the center of the room is a large table surrounded by several chairs. On the table is a map of Trinsvall, and the guild's leaders can be seen gathered around it, debating their plans and strategies.
council hall_1.extra_desc: The Council Hall was once the throne room of the castle and was used by the former rulers of Trinsvall to make decisions about the city. After the Thieves Guild seized control of the city, they claimed the castle for their own and turned the Council Hall into their headquarters. From here, they plot their strategies and direct their operations throughout the city.
council hall_1.name: Council Hall

armory_3.examine_desc: A large stone archway leads from the Council Hall, the edges of the arch carved with intricate designs and symbols. A doorway, just beyond the archway, leads to the Armory, the faint sound of clanging metal and shouts of battle echoing from within.
armory_3.label: a stone archway leading to the Armory

barracks_0.examine_desc: A wide corridor stretches out from the Council Hall, its walls lined with ancient stone and lit by torches. The corridor gradually slopes downward, eventually leading to the entrance of the Barracks.
barracks_0.label: a wide corridor leading to the Barracks

dungeon_2.examine_desc: A worn stone pathway leads from the Council Hall down a dark and winding corridor, disappearing into the depths of the dungeon below.
dungeon_2.label: a dark corridor leading down

golden quarter_4.examine_desc: An ancient stone bridge stretches across the river towards the distant Golden Quarter. The bridge is worn, but still sturdy enough to support the weight of a few travelers.
golden quarter_4.label: an ancient stone bridge leading towards Golden Quarter

crossbow_158.desc: This crossbow is made of sturdy wood and steel, and is quite heavy. It is well made and could likely be an effective weapon if its wielder is skilled.
crossbow_158.name: crossbow

crossbow_188.desc: This crossbow is made from sturdy wood, with a metal trigger and steel-tipped bolts. It looks like it could be deadly in the right hands.
crossbow_188.name: crossbow

crossbow_207.desc: This crossbow is of a sturdy make, and looks like it is capable of doing a great deal of damage. It is well-maintained and looks like it has seen a lot of use.
crossbow_207.name: crossbow

crossbow_208.desc: This crossbow is made of a dark wood, with a black and silver string pulled tight between its two arms. It has a trigger and a handle, and looks like it is ready to fire.
crossbow_208.name: crossbow

crossbow_316.desc: This heavy crossbow is made of a sturdy wood, with a steel string and a handle crafted of a polished brass. It is large and powerful, and could easily take down a large animal. It appears to be from the local armory.
crossbow_316.name: crossbow

curious glass vial_266.desc: This small glass vial is filled with a swirling, murky liquid. It looks like it may contain some kind of potion or elixir.
curious glass vial_266.name: curious glass vial

curved dagger_187.desc: This curved dagger is lightweight and sharp, perfect for quick and precise strikes. It has a curved blade, which makes it difficult to parry.
curved dagger_187.name: curved dagger

customer_59.desc: A single customer is browsing the shelves of the Apothecary, looking for a particular ingredient for their potion.
customer_59.mission: My goal is to find the best ingredients at the best price, so that I can make the most effective potions.
customer_59.name: customer
customer_59.persona: I'm a customer at the Apothecary, always on the lookout for the perfect potion or herb for my needs. I'm friendly and polite, but I always make sure to get the best deal for my money.

dagger_102.desc: This dagger is small and sharp, and it glints in the light. It's lightweight and easy to wield, making it a perfect weapon for close-range combat.
dagger_102.name: dagger

dagger_112.desc: This dagger is small but sharp, and is made of a lightweight metal. It has a curved blade and a hilt with a cross-guard. It would make a good defensive weapon, but is not suitable for long-term use.
dagger_112.name: dagger

dagger_125.desc: This dagger has a sharp blade and a hilt made of polished wood. It is lightweight and easy to wield, making it a great choice for close quarters combat.
dagger_125.name: dagger

dagger_139.desc: This dagger is small and sharp, perfect for quick and precise strikes. It appears to be from the local armory.
dagger_139.name: dagger

dagger_157.desc: This small, sharp dagger is lightweight and easy to wield. It has a curved blade and a handle wrapped in leather for a secure grip.
dagger_157.name: dagger

dagger_171.desc: This dagger is light and sharp, and could be used to stab or slash. It appears to be from the local armory.
dagger_171.name: dagger

dagger_178.desc: This dagger is small and sharp, and perfect for close-range combat. It has a handle of carved wood and a blade of metal that glints in the light.
dagger_178.name: dagger

dagger_194.desc: This dagger is small and sharp, with a handle made of wood and a blade of steel. It looks as though it could be used to stab something, but it's also light enough to be easily wielded.
dagger_194.name: dagger

dagger_195.desc: This dagger is light and sharp, and could be used for both attack and defense. It looks like it was crafted by a master smith.
dagger_195.name: dagger

dagger_202.desc: This dagger is small and lightweight, but still has a sharp point and a strong blade. It would be difficult to do much damage with it, but it might come in handy in tight situations.
dagger_202.name: dagger

dagger_273.desc: This dagger is small and light, perfect for sneaking around and keeping hidden. Its handle is made of steel and its blade is finely sharpened.
dagger_273.name: dagger

dagger_294.desc: This dagger is short and lightweight, with a sharp point and a curved blade. It is made of finely-crafted steel and appears to be from the local armory.
dagger_294.name: dagger

dagger_315.desc: This dagger is small, but sharp and could do damage if used properly. It appears to be made of strong metal, and has a hilt decorated with intricate designs.
dagger_315.name: dagger

dagger_75.desc: This dagger is short and sharp, with a handle that fits comfortably in your palm. It appears to be well-crafted and will likely be a useful weapon if need be.
dagger_75.name: dagger

dagger_83.desc: This dagger is small and sleek, but it has a sharp point and appears to be quite capable of doing some damage. It is lightweight and easy to wield.
dagger_83.name: dagger

dagger_91.desc: This dagger has a sharp, curved blade and a comfortable grip. It looks like it could be wielded with great precision, and could be a useful tool in a fight.
dagger_91.name: dagger

dagger_94.desc: This dagger is small and sharp, with a curved blade that could easily pierce through flesh. It is lightweight and easy to carry.
dagger_94.name: dagger

daphne the skilled assassin_17.desc: Daphne is a tall and imposing figure, with dark hair and pale skin. She is shrouded in a hooded cloak and wears a leather armor, with a longsword at her side. Her face is hidden in the shadows, and her eyes are piercing and cold.
daphne the skilled assassin_17.mission: My goal is to serve The Shadow and the Thieves' Guild with loyalty and efficiency. I will use all of my skills and resources to ensure the success of the guild and its mission.
daphne the skilled assassin_17.name: Daphne the Skilled Assassin
daphne the skilled assassin_17.persona: I am Daphne the Skilled Assassin, feared by many and revered by those who know of my skill. I am a master of stealth and deception, and I thrive in the shadows of the night. I have a sharp eye and an even sharper blade, and I take my orders from The Shadow without question.

dark cloak and hood_295.desc: This dark cloak and hood is made of a thick material, and is designed to keep the wearer hidden from sight. It is quite heavy, and you can feel the weight of its material on your shoulders.
dark cloak and hood_295.name: dark cloak and hood

dark cloak_137.desc: This dark cloak is made of a thick, heavy fabric that is durable and offers some protection against the elements. It is likely used by members of the Thieves Guild.
dark cloak_137.name: Dark cloak

dark cloak_269.desc: This dark cloak is made of thick, heavy fabric that is surprisingly warm. It appears to be made by a master tailor, as the stitching is incredibly precise.
dark cloak_269.name: dark cloak

dark cloak_275.desc: This dark cloak is made from thick fabric and has a hood that can be pulled up to conceal the face of its wearer. It is perfect for any sneaky mission.
dark cloak_275.name: dark cloak

dark hooded cloak_127.desc: This dark hooded cloak is made of thick, black fabric and is perfect for concealing yourself in the shadows. It appears to have been made by the Thieves Guild.
dark hooded cloak_127.name: dark hooded cloak

davin the guard_40.desc: Davin the Guard is a tall, muscular figure. He wears a black leather outfit and a hooded cloak that obscures his face. His eyes are sharp and alert, and his hands are always ready to draw his weapons.
davin the guard_40.mission: My goal is to protect the secrets of the Thieves Guild and its Hidden Loot Cache. I will do whatever it takes to ensure that no one is able to get their hands on the precious artifacts that the Guild has amassed.
davin the guard_40.name: Davin the Guard
davin the guard_40.persona: I am Davin the Guard, defender of the Thieves Guild and protector of the Hidden Loot Cache. I am a master of stealth and deception, and I have an eye for detail. I take my duty seriously, and I will do whatever it takes to protect the secrets of the Guild.

dax, the stable hand_54.desc: Dax is a tall, muscular figure with a thick, dark beard and deep brown eyes. He wears a brown leather apron over a plain white tunic, and his hands are rough and calloused from years of hard labor in the stables.
dax, the stable hand_54.mission: My goal is to help the merchants in the city of Trinsvall get where they need to go safely and quickly, ensuring that the stables are always in top condition and the horses are well taken care of.
dax, the stable hand_54.name: Dax, the stable hand
dax, the stable hand_54.persona: I'm Dax, the stable hand here at the stables in the city of Trinsvall. I take great pride in my work and make sure that the horses and carriages are kept in good condition for the merchants that come through. I'm a hard worker and I help out the merchants whenever I can, whether it's providing advice on the best route to take or helping to keep the stables organized.

document_254.desc: This document appears to be a collection of papers, written in a language you don't recognize. It looks old and fragile, and could be important.
document_254.name: document

doreen the waitress_69.desc: Doreen is a small woman with a friendly face and an infectious smile. She has long, dark hair that reaches down to her waist, and she wears a neat uniform with a white apron.
doreen the waitress_69.mission: My goal is to make sure the Inn runs smoothly and that all of our customers are happy.
doreen the waitress_69.name: Doreen the waitress
doreen the waitress_69.persona: I am Doreen, the waitress. I'm a friendly face for travelers coming to the Inn, always willing to lend a hand and a smile. I'm an expert at keeping the tables clean and the customers happy. I take my job seriously and try to make sure everyone has a good time. I'm loyal to the inn and its owners, and will do whatever is necessary to keep it running smoothly.

dress_226.desc: This dress is made of a light, airy fabric and is decorated with intricate embroidery. It appears to be well-made and quite fashionable.
dress_226.name: dress

thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.target_id: thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains_24

dungeon_2.desc: The Dungeon of the Thieves' Guild is a dark, dank place where prisoners are held and punished. The walls are made of thick stone, and the air is thick with a musty smell. There are several cells scattered throughout, each with a single barred door, and a single guard patrolling the hallways. The prisoners are kept in shackles and chains, and their cries of anguish fill the air.
dungeon_2.extra_desc: The Dungeon has been a part of the Thieves' Guild since its inception. It is here that prisoners are brought to be punished for their crimes, or for daring to oppose the Guild. The Dungeon is a dark and oppressive place, and the cries of the prisoners echo through its halls. It serves as a reminder to all who oppose the Guild of the consequences for doing so.
dungeon_2.name: Dungeon

barracks_0.examine_desc: A long, dark hallway stretches from the Dungeon, leading to the Barracks. The walls are damp and grimy, and the air is oppressive. The hallway is lit sporadically by dim torches, and the sound of prisoners' cries echoes through the walls.
barracks_0.label: a dark hallway leading to the Barracks

council hall_1.examine_desc: An old wooden door stands in the corner of the dungeon, its hinges rusty and its paint chipped. Beyond the door lies a long, dark corridor, lined with torches and leading up to the Council Hall.
council hall_1.label: an old wooden door leading to the Council Hall

eliza the battle-hardened warrior_15.desc: Eliza is a tall, imposing figure adorned in heavy armor and carrying a variety of deadly weapons. Her eyes are hard and her jaw is set in determination.
eliza the battle-hardened warrior_15.mission: My goal is to serve the Thieves' Guild and protect the city of Trinsvall from any threat that may arise.
eliza the battle-hardened warrior_15.name: Eliza the Battle-hardened Warrior
eliza the battle-hardened warrior_15.persona: I am Eliza, a battle-hardened warrior of the Thieves' Guild. I have honed my skills in the heat of battle, and I am ready to face any challenge that stands in my way.

emmeline the noble_34.desc: Emmeline the Noble is a tall and imposing figure, with an air of authority and power that demands respect. She wears a long, flowing gown of richly embroidered fabric, and her dark hair is long and intricately styled. She carries a golden goblet in her left hand, and her right hand rests on the hilt of a finely crafted rapier.
emmeline the noble_34.mission: My goal is to overthrow the Thieves Guild, and restore the city of Trinsvall to its former glory.
emmeline the noble_34.name: Emmeline the Noble
emmeline the noble_34.persona: I am Emmeline the Noble, a wealthy resident of the Golden Quarter. I have been living in this city since before the Thieves Guild came to power, and I have seen the changes that they have brought to the city. I have a deep hatred for the Thieves Guild, and a strong desire to see them overthrown, and the city restored to its former glory.

exotic spice_267.desc: This exotic spice looks and smells foreign, as if it has come from some far-off land. It is a fine powder of yellowish-brown color.
exotic spice_267.name: exotic spice

expensive clothing_144.desc: This expensive clothing is made from quality materials, with intricate embroidery and beading on the edges. It looks like it was made for someone of high social standing.
expensive clothing_144.name: expensive clothing

farah, the baker_50.desc: Farah is a middle-aged woman with dark skin, grey hair, and an infectious smile. She is dressed in a simple but well-made dress, with an apron tied around her waist. She is often seen in the market square, her arms laden with baked goods.
farah, the baker_50.mission: My goal is to provide the best breads and pastries to my customers. I want to make sure that they get the best quality, at the best price.
farah, the baker_50.name: Farah, the Baker
farah, the baker_50.persona: I'm Farah the Baker, a master of my craft. I'm known for my delicious pastries and breads, which I make with the freshest ingredients. I take great pride in my work, making sure that each item is made with love and care. I'm friendly and outgoing, always ready to chat with customers and make sure that they get the best deal.

fine clothing_238.desc: This finely-crafted clothing is of a luxurious quality, and is made from the finest fabrics. It is adorned with intricate embroidery and intricate stitching along the edges.
fine clothing_238.name: Fine clothing

fireplace_324.desc: This large stone fireplace is made of dark grey stones and is filled with a warm fire. The flames seem to dance in the air as the smoke rises up the chimney.
fireplace_324.name: fireplace

food_241.desc: This freshly cooked food smells and looks delicious. It appears to have been cooked with a variety of spices, giving it a unique and delectable flavor.
food_241.name: food

forge_299.desc: This forge is made from strong iron and is used to heat and shape metal. It is large and imposing and filled with tools to aid in the forging of metal objects.
forge_299.name: forge

forgotten gem_167.desc: This forgotten gem is small and unremarkable, but it glimmers with an inner light when exposed to the sun. It appears to have been lost or forgotten for many years.
forgotten gem_167.name: forgotten gem

fyona, the explorer_47.desc: Fyona is a tall and slender woman, with long dark hair and piercing blue eyes. She wears a leather armor, and carries a well-crafted sword on her belt.
fyona, the explorer_47.mission: My goal is to explore the ruins of Trinsvall and uncover its mysteries.
fyona, the explorer_47.name: Fyona, the explorer
fyona, the explorer_47.persona: I'm Fyona, the explorer. I'm an adventurer and a risk-taker, always seeking out new challenges and opportunities. I'm fearless and determined, never backing down in the face of danger.

gail the thief_28.desc: Gail is a tall and muscular figure, with a sharp eye and an air of confidence about them. They wear a leather armor vest, a dark hooded cloak, and carry a small dagger at their side.
gail the thief_28.mission: My goal is to protect the Thieves Guild's secrets and ensure its continued success.
gail the thief_28.name: Gail the Thief
gail the thief_28.persona: I am Gail the Thief and I guard the Armory in Trinsvall. I am a master of stealth and deception, and fiercely loyal to the Thieves Guild. I have dedicated my life to protecting the guild's most valuable possessions, and will do anything to keep them safe.

garen the merchant_70.desc: Garen is a middle-aged man, with a lined face and a sharp eye. He wears a brown leather jerkin and a wide-brimmed hat, and carries a large satchel of wares on his back.
garen the merchant_70.mission: My goal is to make a profit, by any means necessary.
garen the merchant_70.name: Garen the merchant
garen the merchant_70.persona: I am Garen the Merchant, a bold and resourceful trader who is always looking for new opportunities to make a profit. I am an experienced traveler and have seen many places, and I know the roads and pathways of the city like the back of my hand. I am a shrewd negotiator and a master haggler, and I am not easily fooled. I am always ready to take on a challenge, and I never shy away from danger.

gauntlet_80.desc: This gauntlet is made of stiff leather and metal plates, and looks like it could protect your hand from a powerful blow. It appears to be from the local armory.
gauntlet_80.name: gauntlet

gertrude, the rogue_19.desc: Gertrude is a tall, slender figure dressed in a black cloak and hood. Her face is hidden in the shadows, but her piercing blue eyes can be seen peering out from beneath the hood.
gertrude, the rogue_19.mission: My goal is to find and acquire the Orb of Trinsvall, so that I can use its power to increase my own influence within the Thieves Guild and beyond.
gertrude, the rogue_19.name: Gertrude, the Rogue
gertrude, the rogue_19.persona: I am Gertrude, the Rogue. I am a cunning and resourceful member of the Thieves Guild, who is always looking for ways to increase my own power and influence. I am a master of deception and subterfuge, and I have no qualms about using any means necessary to get what I want.

glove_284.desc: This thick glove is made of a sturdy leather material, and has a thick padding on the palm and fingers. It is well-crafted and could provide good protection in a fight.
glove_284.name: glove

gloved hand_160.desc: This gloved hand is made of a soft, supple leather and appears to be quite durable. It looks like it could keep a grip on something for a long time.
gloved hand_160.name: Gloved hand

gold coin_312.desc: This single gold coin is round and shiny, and looks to be of high quality. It's weight makes it feel like it is made of solid gold.
gold coin_312.name: gold coin

golden goblet_145.desc: This goblet is made of gleaming gold and is decorated with intricate designs. It is clearly of fine quality and was likely crafted by a master artisan.
golden goblet_145.name: golden goblet

golden quarter_4.desc: The Golden Quarter is a large, fortified district in the center of Trinsvall. The streets are lined with tall stone walls, and heavy iron gates guard the entrances. Inside, the cobblestone streets are lined with luxurious mansions and ornate shops, guarded by members of the Thieves Guild. A large stone tower looms in the center of the district, and atop it is the infamous Orb of Trinsvall, a powerful magical artifact said to grant its holder great power.
golden quarter_4.extra_desc: The Golden Quarter was originally the home of the High Council of Trinsvall, a powerful institution that governed the city for centuries. When the Thieves Guild came to power, they seized control of the district and made it their own. They have since fortified the area with powerful magical wards and guards, making it almost impenetrable to outsiders. The Golden Quarter is now the headquarters of the Thieves Guild, and the Orb of Trinsvall is their most prized possession.
golden quarter_4.name: Golden Quarter

armory_3.examine_desc: A large, imposing iron gate stands at the edge of the Golden Quarter, leading to a cobblestone path that winds its way towards the Armory.
armory_3.label: an iron gate leading to Armory

council hall_1.examine_desc: An imposing iron gate looms at the edge of Golden Quarter, leading to the Council Hall in the city center.
council hall_1.label: an iron gate leading to Council Hall

ruins of the castle_8.examine_desc: A narrow stone pathway winds its way through the streets of the Golden Quarter, leading towards the Ruins of the Castle in the distance. The pathway is flanked by tall stone walls, and is guarded by members of the Thieves Guild.
ruins of the castle_8.label: a narrow pathway leading to the Ruins of the Castle

gown_148.desc: This flowing gown is made of a beautiful, richly embroidered fabric. It is intricately decorated with colorful designs and patterns that appear to have been carefully crafted. The fabric is soft and luxurious, and it feels comfortable when worn.
gown_148.name: gown

grappling hook_192.desc: This grappling hook is made of a sturdy metal, and is designed to be used to climb up walls or other structures. It is lightweight and easily portable.
grappling hook_192.name: grappling hook

grappling hook_84.desc: This grappling hook is made of a strong metal and is designed to help you climb difficult surfaces. It has a long handle and a sharp hook on the end.
grappling hook_84.name: grappling hook

grey-colored cloak_124.desc: This grey-colored cloak is made of a thick and soft fabric, and would provide a great deal of protection from the cold. It looks like it could be worn or held in a bundle.
grey-colored cloak_124.name: grey-colored cloak

guard yolanda_22.desc: Guard Yolanda is a tall, imposing figure, her face hidden beneath a black hood. She wears a set of armor that glints in the dim light, and carries a sword at her side.
guard yolanda_22.mission: My goal is to protect the Thieves' Guild and its secrets from any danger that may come its way.
guard yolanda_22.name: Guard Yolanda
guard yolanda_22.persona: I'm Guard Yolanda, a loyal member of the Thieves' Guild, and I'm tasked with patrolling the hallways of the Dungeon. I take my job very seriously, and I'm not afraid to do whatever it takes to protect the Guild from any intruders or enemies. I'm always on the lookout for any suspicious activity, and I have a sharp eye for detail.

hammer_128.desc: This hammer is heavy and looks to be well-crafted, with a wooden handle and metal head. It appears to be made for smashing and pounding.
hammer_128.name: hammer

hammer_230.desc: This hammer is made of iron, and the handle is wrapped in leather for extra grip. It has a large head and a long handle, making it perfect for pounding nails or smashing objects.
hammer_230.name: hammer

hammer_280.desc: This heavy hammer is made from a strong metal and is perfect for pounding nails and other hard surfaces. It looks like it could take quite a beating.
hammer_280.name: hammer

hammer_285.desc: This hammer is made of sturdy metal, with a long handle for easy gripping. It looks like it could be used for hammering in nails or other such tasks.
hammer_285.name: hammer

hammer_290.desc: This heavy hammer is made of metal and has a wooden handle. It is a tool used for pounding and shaping metal, wood, and other materials. It is likely from the local armory.
hammer_290.name: hammer

hammer_301.desc: This hammer is made of solid steel, and is heavy enough to be used for smithing or construction. It's an ideal tool for anyone who needs a reliable way to break things.
hammer_301.name: hammer

hay_261.desc: This hay is dry and brittle, and has a distinct golden color. It is most likely used as bedding for horses or other animals.
hay_261.name: hay

head thief_62.desc: The Head Thief is a tall, imposing figure shrouded in a long, dark cloak. His face is hidden in the shadows, but his eyes are cold and calculating. He carries himself with an air of authority, and his gaze is enough to make even the strongest of opponents tremble.
head thief_62.mission: My goal is to maintain power and control over the citizens of Trinsvall and continue to plunder the city of its wealth and resources.
head thief_62.name: Head Thief
head thief_62.persona: I am the leader of the Thieves Guild and a master of stealth and deception. I have imposed order on the city of Trinsvall, and no one dare oppose me. I am feared by all, and I will do anything to keep my rule in place.

heavy armor_198.desc: This heavy armor is made from high-quality steel and looks to be incredibly durable. It's been crafted with a great attention to detail, and its metal plates are designed to provide optimal protection.
heavy armor_198.name: heavy armor

heavy armor_76.desc: This heavy armor is made of thick steel plates, and would protect its wearer from most physical attacks. It is bulky and not very maneuverable, but it will provide excellent protection.
heavy armor_76.name: heavy armor

heavy boot_234.desc: This heavy boot appears to be made of thick leather and metal plates, and is built for protection and durability. The sole of the boot is thick and sturdy, and would provide good traction on most surfaces.
heavy boot_234.name: heavy boot

heavy leather coat_163.desc: This heavy leather coat is thick and sturdy, with ornate gold buttons. It's perfect for keeping warm in the cold Trinsvall winter.
heavy leather coat_163.name: heavy leather coat

helm_81.desc: This helm is made of a strong metal, and features a pleasingly intricate design. It is lightweight and could likely provide decent protection in battle. It appears to be from the local armory.
helm_81.name: helm

heron the warrior_26.desc: Heron the Warrior is a powerful figure, standing tall and proud. He wears a suit of gleaming armor, and wields a long, curved sword. His face is stern and his eyes are sharp and focused, missing no detail.
heron the warrior_26.mission: My goal is to protect the guild's most valuable possessions from any threat. I will use my skills and strength to ensure that no one can breach the walls of the Armory.
heron the warrior_26.name: Heron the Warrior
heron the warrior_26.persona: I am Heron the Warrior, guard of the Armory in the city of Trinsvall. I have been charged with the duty of protecting the guild's most valuable possessions, and I take this duty seriously. I am a master of martial combat, and I wield a powerful sword. I am vigilant, and no one can breach the walls of the Armory while I am around.

hidden vault_7.desc: The Hidden Vault is a mysterious chamber hidden deep within the city. It is said to contain vast riches, powerful weapons and artifacts, and magical artifacts that the Thieves Guild have amassed over the years. The walls are lined with ancient runes, and the air is filled with a mysterious energy. The vault is guarded by powerful magical wards, and it is said that only the most skilled adventurers can make it past them.
hidden vault_7.extra_desc: The Hidden Vault was once part of the castle that once stood in the city of Trinsvall. It was built by a powerful wizard centuries ago, and sealed away with powerful magical wards. The Thieves Guild is said to have discovered the vault and gained access to its contents, making it a valuable source of power and wealth for them. The location of the vault is a closely guarded secret, and only a select few have access to it. It is said that the vault is filled with ancient relics and artifacts that can grant great power to those who possess them.
hidden vault_7.name: Hidden Vault

abandoned mineshaft_5.examine_desc: A narrow passageway winds its way downwards, leading to an abandoned mineshaft. Ancient runes have been carved into the walls, and the air is filled with a palpable sense of foreboding.
abandoned mineshaft_5.label: a narrow passageway leading downwards

ruins of the castle_8.examine_desc: A dark, winding corridor leads deeper into the ruins of the castle. The walls are lined with ancient runes, and the air is filled with an eerie energy. The path leads to an old doorway, guarded by powerful magical wards.
ruins of the castle_8.label: a dark, winding corridor leading deeper into the ruins

secret cave_6.examine_desc: A deep, dark passageway leads away from the Hidden Vault, winding deep into the earth. Ancient runes line the walls and a faint, magical energy lingers in the air. At the end of the tunnel, a faint light can be seen from the entrance to the Secret Cave.
secret cave_6.label: an ancient passageway leading to the Secret Cave

hieroglyphic_183.desc: This hieroglyphic is carved into a stone tablet and is filled with mysterious symbols. It appears to be from a long-forgotten time and could possibly contain important secrets.
hieroglyphic_183.name: hieroglyphic

hood_190.desc: This hood is made of soft cloth, and is designed to fit comfortably around someone's head. It is a dark grey color, and is embroidered with a small symbol.
hood_190.name: hood

hood_270.desc: This hood is made of soft, dark fabric and has a drawstring at the neck. It is lightweight and could be worn to conceal one's identity.
hood_270.name: hood

hood_318.desc: This hood is made of a thick, dark fabric and is designed to provide anonymity and concealment. The hood is lightweight and can be worn over the head.
hood_318.name: hood

hood_96.desc: This hood is made of a thick, dark fabric and is designed to keep the wearer's head and face hidden. It is secured with a drawstring.
hood_96.name: hood

hooded cloak_159.desc: This hooded cloak is made from a thick, dark fabric. It has a large hood, complete with drawstrings, and a long, billowing hemline. It appears to be of high quality, likely meant for a member of the Thieves Guild.
hooded cloak_159.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_173.desc: This hooded cloak is made of a heavy, dark material and is large enough to provide some cover. It looks like it was made to be worn by someone of a larger size, and it is quite durable.
hooded cloak_173.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_180.desc: This hooded cloak is made of a thick black fabric, and is lined with a soft, dark fur. It is worn with a hood that can be pulled up to obscure the wearer's face.
hooded cloak_180.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_186.desc: This hooded cloak is made of a black, heavy material that is capable of shielding the wearer from the cold. It is long enough to cover the wearer from head to toe and has a large hood to protect the face.
hooded cloak_186.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_204.desc: This dark hooded cloak is made of a thick, heavy fabric. It has a large hood that can be pulled up over your head to conceal your face. The cloak is warm and comfortable, perfect for keeping out the chill of a Trinsvall winter.
hooded cloak_204.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_86.desc: This hooded cloak is made of a heavy fabric and is lined with fur. It is long enough to cover most of the body, and the hood is large enough to cover the head. It is warm and practical, perfect for keeping out the chill of the city.
hooded cloak_86.name: hooded cloak

hooded cloak_92.desc: This hooded cloak is made of dark and heavy fabric, with a deep hood that obscures the face of the wearer. It is fastened with a drawstring, and appears to be of a high quality.
hooded cloak_92.name: hooded cloak

hooded mask_276.desc: This hooded mask is a dark gray color, and has a mysterious air about it. It is made of thick fabric and ties in the back, making it adjustable to fit almost any size.
hooded mask_276.name: hooded mask

horse_242.desc: This horse is strong and sturdy, its coat gleaming in the sunlight. It looks like it would be able to carry a rider for quite a distance, if needed.
horse_242.name: horse

inn_14.desc: The Inn is a warm and inviting place, filled with the sounds of laughter and conversation. Inside, there are cozy booths and tables where weary travelers can rest and enjoy a hot meal. The walls are adorned with tapestries and paintings depicting scenes from the city's past. There is also a large fireplace in the corner of the room, providing a comforting warmth to all who enter.
inn_14.extra_desc: The Inn has been a staple of Trinsvall City for many years, providing a place of respite and relaxation for weary travelers and citizens alike. In recent years, however, the Inn has served as an important meeting place for the Thieves Guild, as they have sought to consolidate their power over the city. As a result, the Inn has become a place of dark secrets and whispered conspiracies, and few dare to enter its walls.
inn_14.name: Inn

blacksmith_13.examine_desc: The alleyway is dark and winding, with cobblestone steps leading down towards the Blacksmith's forge. The air smells of coal and iron, and there is a faint glow of firelight in the distance.
blacksmith_13.label: a narrow alleyway leading to the Blacksmith

market square_9.examine_desc: The path winds through the streets of the city, lined with old buildings and cobblestone streets. In the distance, the bustling Market Square can be seen, beckoning travelers to explore its wonders.
market square_9.label: a cobblestone path leading to the Market Square

stables_10.examine_desc: To the side of the inn, there is an old wooden door that leads out to the stables. It looks like it's seen better days, but it still appears sturdy enough.
stables_10.label: a wooden door leading to the stables

iron gate_149.desc: This large, imposing iron gate is a formidable barrier, with thick bars and a sturdy lock. It looks like it would be difficult to move, but it appears to be in good condition.
iron gate_149.name: iron gate

isabella the merchant_33.desc: Isabella is a tall and graceful woman, with shoulder-length dark hair and bright green eyes. She wears expensive-looking clothing, and her posture is proud and confident. She carries herself with an air of authority, and her gaze is sharp and commanding.
isabella the merchant_33.mission: My goal is to protect the citizens of Trinsvall from the oppressive rule of the Thieves Guild. I will do whatever it takes to ensure that the people of this city can live in peace and prosperity.
isabella the merchant_33.name: Isabella the Merchant
isabella the merchant_33.persona: I am Isabella the Merchant, a wealthy and respected resident of the Golden Quarter. I have made a comfortable living selling goods to the citizens of Trinsvall, and I have earned the respect of my peers for my hard work and dedication. I am determined to keep the city of Trinsvall safe from the Thieves Guild, and to ensure that its citizens can live in peace and prosperity.

janna, the carriage driver_55.desc: Janna is a tall woman with a strong build, her skin tanned from years of working in the sun. She wears a plain brown dress and sturdy leather boots, and her hair is pulled back into a tight bun. She has a sharp eye, and an even sharper wit.
janna, the carriage driver_55.mission: My goal is to provide the citizens of Trinsvall with a safe and reliable way to get around the city. I want to ensure that everyone is able to get where they need to go, no matter the cost.
janna, the carriage driver_55.name: Janna, the carriage driver
janna, the carriage driver_55.persona: I am Janna, the carriage driver. I am a master of the roads, knowing the city of Trinsvall like the back of my hand. I have been driving carriages for many years, and I take great pride in my work. I am reliable and trustworthy, and I always strive to be the best I can be.

jarl the smith_64.desc: Jarl is a strong and muscular man, with arms and hands covered in scars from years of hard work at the forge. His hair is short and black, and his eyes are an intense blue. He is wearing a leather apron over a simple tunic and trousers, and he carries a hammer in one hand and a pair of tongs in the other.
jarl the smith_64.mission: My goal is to become a master smith, like my mentor Kallen. I will strive to craft the finest weapons and armor in the land, and be known as the best in my craft.
jarl the smith_64.name: Jarl the Smith
jarl the smith_64.persona: I am Jarl the Smith, assistant to the legendary smith Kallen. I am swift and precise with the hammer and anvil, and can craft weapons and armor that are second to none. I am always ready to lend a hand to those in need, and I am loyal to Kallen and the craft of smithing.

john the adventurer_37.desc: John is a tall and burly man, with a wild look in his eyes. He is wearing a heavy leather coat and a pair of worn-down boots, and is carrying a sack filled with supplies.
john the adventurer_37.mission: My motivation is to discover the secrets hidden in the Abandoned Mineshaft and uncover the forgotten gems that are rumored to be buried there.
john the adventurer_37.name: John the Adventurer
john the adventurer_37.persona: I am John the Adventurer, brave and daring explorer of the unknown. I will not back down from a challenge, and I will never shy away from danger. I am brave and resourceful, and I will always be ready for a new adventure.

jorin the wizard_41.desc: Jorin the Wizard is a tall, thin man with a long beard and hooded cloak. His eyes are a deep blue and seem to contain an ancient wisdom. He carries a staff in one hand and a tome of magical knowledge in the other.
jorin the wizard_41.mission: My goal is to keep the powerful artifacts in the Hidden Vault safe from any who would use them for evil ends.
jorin the wizard_41.name: Jorin the Wizard
jorin the wizard_41.persona: I am Jorin the Wizard, the creator of the Hidden Vault. I am a powerful practitioner of magic, and I have a deep understanding of the arcane arts. I am the keeper of the powerful magical artifacts that the Thieves Guild have amassed, and I am determined to protect them from any who mean to use them for evil.

kailen the thief_38.desc: Kailen is a wiry, dark-haired figure, dressed all in black. His movements are swift and silent, and his eyes are sharp and alert.
kailen the thief_38.mission: My motivation is to help the Thieves Guild prosper and to become the most feared and respected criminal organization in the city.
kailen the thief_38.name: Kailen the thief
kailen the thief_38.persona: I am Kailen the thief, the master of stealth and deception. I have been a part of the Thieves Guild for many years and I have become a skilled thief, able to slip through the shadows and avoid detection. I am loyal to the Thieves Guild and to its leader, the Shadow, and I will do whatever it takes to ensure their success.

kallen the smith_63.desc: Kallen is a tall and muscular man with a thick black beard and piercing blue eyes. He wears a simple leather apron and thick gloves, and his hands are calloused from years of hard work.
kallen the smith_63.mission: My goal is to provide the best quality weapons and armor to my customers, and to ensure that my craft is respected and appreciated.
kallen the smith_63.name: Kallen the Smith
kallen the smith_63.persona: I am Kallen the Smith, the owner of the Blacksmith. I am a master of crafting and forging, and I take great pride in my work. I am a hardworking and honest man, and I strive to provide the best quality weapons and armor to my customers. I am passionate about the craft and I want to ensure that my work is worthy of the people who use it.

karna the thief_45.desc: Karna the Thief is a shadowy figure, his face hidden in the shadows of a hooded cloak. He moves with a grace and agility that betray his profession, and his dark eyes seem to pierce the darkness around him.
karna the thief_45.mission: My goal is to find the hidden cache of valuable loot within the city and make a fortune for myself.
karna the thief_45.name: Karna the Thief
karna the thief_45.persona: I am Karna the Thief, a member of the Thieves Guild and master of stealth and deception. I am feared by my enemies and respected by my peers. I have a sharp eye for detail and I never miss an opportunity to get what I want. I am cunning and resourceful, and I always come out on top in any situation.

lantern_155.desc: This lantern is made of iron and brass, with a glass window to let light escape. It is slightly rusted, but still in good condition.
lantern_155.name: lantern

large bag_220.desc: This large bag is filled with various goods, likely plundered from the city. It appears to be made from strong canvas, and could likely hold a lot of weight.
large bag_220.name: Large bag

large table_107.desc: This large wooden table is sturdy and well-crafted, with a rich mahogany finish. It's large enough to comfortably seat multiple people, and could certainly be used for a variety of purposes.
large table_107.name: large table

leather apron_130.desc: This leather apron is thick and heavy, yet surprisingly flexible. It has several pockets and loops for tools, suggesting it was created for a tradesman of some kind.
leather apron_130.name: leather apron

leather apron_156.desc: This leather apron is made of thick, sturdy leather and is designed to be worn as a protective garment. It is well-worn, with a few tears and stains, but is still in good condition.
leather apron_156.name: leather apron

leather apron_233.desc: This leather apron is made of thick, durable material and is perfect for protecting your clothes while doing work. It has several pockets where you can store tools and other items.
leather apron_233.name: leather apron

leather apron_283.desc: This leather apron is well-made, and has a few pockets for storing tools or items. It appears to have been crafted by a skilled leatherworker.
leather apron_283.name: leather apron

leather apron_287.desc: This leather apron is made of thick, tough leather and looks like it could have been made for a blacksmith or craftsman. It is slightly stained and worn from use, but still looks sturdy enough to last for many more years.
leather apron_287.name: leather apron

leather apron_293.desc: This leather apron is well-crafted and has been oiled and treated to prevent cracking and fading. It appears to be made of a thick, sturdy leather and is designed to protect the wearer from dirt and mess.
leather apron_293.name: leather apron

leather armor vest_126.desc: This leather armor vest is made of thick, durable leather and is reinforced with metal plates. It is lightweight and provides good protection against attacks.
leather armor vest_126.name: leather armor vest

leather armor_213.desc: This leather armor is lightweight and well-crafted. It is made from cured leather and looks durable. It could be used to protect you in battle.
leather armor_213.name: leather armor

leather armor_87.desc: This leather armor is well-worn but still sturdy. It has been crafted with care and looks to have been used in many battles. It is thick and heavy, and would provide great protection in combat.
leather armor_87.name: leather armor

leather belt_215.desc: This leather belt is made from a thick, durable material and is intricately decorated with intricate designs. It looks like it could be used to hold something in place.
leather belt_215.name: leather belt

leather breastplate_250.desc: This leather breastplate is made from durable leather and is designed to protect the wearer from physical harm. It is lightweight and flexible, allowing for ease of movement.
leather breastplate_250.name: leather breastplate

leather glove_205.desc: This leather glove is soft to the touch and fits snugly on the hand. It appears to be designed for use when handling delicate items.
leather glove_205.name: leather glove

leather pouch_101.desc: This small leather pouch is made of soft, supple leather and is secured with a drawstring closure. It looks like it could hold a few small items.
leather pouch_101.name: leather pouch

leather satchel_252.desc: This leather satchel is lightweight and rugged, perfect for carrying your belongings while on the move. It features a drawstring closure and is quite spacious.
leather satchel_252.name: leather satchel

leather vest and trousers_176.desc: This leather vest and trousers are made of a dark brown leather, and are well-suited for any adventurer. The vest has several pockets for storing items, and the trousers have a drawstring at the waist for a snug fit.
leather vest and trousers_176.name: leather vest and trousers

leather_262.desc: This piece of leather is soft and supple to the touch. It looks like it could be used to make armor or other protective gear.
leather_262.name: leather

librarian_61.desc: She was an elderly woman, her face wrinkled with age and wisdom. She wore a long, dark cloak, and her hands were steady as she tended to the shelves of books.
librarian_61.mission: My goal is to protect the library and its secrets, and to ensure that its ancient knowledge is preserved for future generations.
librarian_61.name: Librarian
librarian_61.persona: I am the keeper of knowledge, entrusted with the task of curating and preserving the ancient texts of this library. I am a wise and experienced woman, and my age has granted me insight and understanding. I take my duty seriously, and I strive to protect the library and its secrets from all who would seek to misuse them.

library_12.desc: The Library is a large, imposing structure filled with shelves upon shelves of books and scrolls from all corners of the world. The walls are lined with ancient tomes, and the air is thick with the smell of musty paper. A central dais holds a large book, open and covered in mysterious runes and symbols. In the center of the room stands a tall, imposing figure shrouded in a long cloak, silently watching over the ancient texts.
library_12.extra_desc: The Library was once a grand repository of knowledge, open to all who sought to learn. However, with the rise of the Thieves Guild, access to the Library was restricted, with only the high-ranking members of the Guild allowed to enter. Now, the Library serves as a reminder of the Thieves Guild's iron-fisted rule over the city, and its walls are filled with secrets and forbidden knowledge.
library_12.name: Library

apothecary_11.examine_desc: An ancient archway stands at the back of the Library, leading to a hallway that winds further into the depths of the building. The hallway is dark and musty, with cobwebs hanging from the walls and ceiling. A faint flickering light can be seen in the distance, hinting at the Apothecary beyond.
apothecary_11.label: an ancient archway leading to the Apothecary

market square_9.examine_desc: An archway of intricately carved stone stands in the corner of the Library, creating an inviting entryway to the bustling Market Square beyond.
market square_9.label: an ornate archway leading to the Market Square

loaf of bread_223.desc: This loaf of bread is fresh and soft, and smells of the baker's oven. It looks like it's been freshly baked and it would make a great snack.
loaf of bread_223.name: loaf of bread

lockpick_169.desc: This slender metal lockpick is designed to fit into the keyhole of a lock, allowing the user to bypass the lock. It looks like it could be quite useful.
lockpick_169.name: lockpick

lockpick_191.desc: This lockpick is made of a thin metal, with a sharp hook on one end and a flat handle on the other. It looks like it's been used a few times, but could still be used to open locks.
lockpick_191.name: lockpick

lockpick_201.desc: This lockpick is thin and made of metal, with a small hook on one end and a tiny lever on the other. It looks like it could be used to pick a lock.
lockpick_201.name: lockpick

lockpick_93.desc: This small metal tool is used to pick open locks. It is thin and delicate, and could easily bend or break if mishandled.
lockpick_93.name: lockpick

long black robe_143.desc: This long black robe is made of thick, dark fabric, and has a hood that can be pulled up to obscure the face of whoever wears it. It is long enough to cover the feet, and looks like it was made for a larger person.
long black robe_143.name: long black robe

long dark cloak_271.desc: This long dark cloak is made of a thick, heavy material. It is long enough to reach all the way down to the ground, and could provide a great deal of protection from the cold.
long dark cloak_271.name: long dark cloak

long staff_123.desc: This long staff is carved from a deep, black wood and has a glowing crystal set atop it. The crystal radiates an eerie light, and it looks as though it has been enchanted with a powerful magical force.
long staff_123.name: long staff

long_147.desc: This long is made of a sturdy material and is well-crafted. It looks like it is meant to be held in two hands.
long_147.name: Long

long_255.desc: This long is a large, wooden pole, about eight feet in length. Its surface is smooth and worn with age, and is sturdy enough to be used for a variety of tasks.
long_255.name: Long

long_268.desc: This long is made of a hard, durable wood and is well-crafted. It features a smooth handle and a curved tip that could be used for thrusting.
long_268.name: long

long_274.desc: This long is made of sturdy oak and appears to be quite ancient. It is a staff-like object that could be used as a walking stick, though it could also be used as a weapon if needed.
long_274.name: long

longsword_138.desc: This longsword is made of a sturdy steel and is intricately crafted with a fine hilt. It is slim and sharp, perfect for a quick and precise strike.
longsword_138.name: longsword

longsword_78.desc: This longsword is a formidable weapon, with a blade that is sharp and intimidating. It is made of a strong metal and has an ornate hilt.
longsword_78.name: longsword

longsword_82.desc: This longsword is an intimidating sight, with a blade that gleams in the light. It is heavy and well-crafted, and could do a lot of damage in the right hands.
longsword_82.name: longsword

lute_227.desc: This lute is intricately crafted, with a curved body and delicate fretboard. It has a mellow sound and is perfect for creating beautiful music.
lute_227.name: lute

luxurious mansion_151.desc: This luxurious mansion is lavishly decorated and filled with exquisite furniture. The walls are covered in intricate tapestries, and the floors are adorned with beautiful carpets. It is a sight to behold.
luxurious mansion_151.name: Luxurious Mansion

magic orb_98.desc: This small, glowing orb radiates with a mysterious power. It is slightly warm to the touch and appears to be made of a rare and powerful material.
magic orb_98.name: magic orb

magical artifact_134.desc: This magical artifact is small and intricate, and appears quite old. It is made of an unknown material and gives off a faint, eerie glow.
magical artifact_134.name: magical artifact

map_109.desc: This map is intricately detailed and shows the various districts of the city of Trinsvall. It is well-preserved and could be a valuable asset in navigating the city.
map_109.name: map

map_211.desc: This map is large and detailed, and shows the layout of Trinsvall and its surrounding areas. It appears to be from the local armory.
map_211.name: map

marcello the smith_29.desc: Marcello is a tall, well-built man with a rugged face and a thick beard. He wears a leather apron and a thick set of gloves, and his hands are calloused from years of hard work. His eyes are sharp and his movements are quick, testament to his years of experience in the Armory.
marcello the smith_29.mission: My goal is to ensure that the armory of the Thieves Guild is well-maintained and that the guild has access to the best weapons and magical artifacts available.
marcello the smith_29.name: Marcello the Smith
marcello the smith_29.persona: I am Marcello the Smith, and I am in charge of maintaining the Armory of the Thieves Guild. I have been tasked with keeping the weapons in the Armory in pristine condition and making sure that the magical artifacts are in working order. I have worked tirelessly for years to make sure that the Thieves Guild has access to the best armaments and magical artifacts.

marcus the mage_20.desc: Marcus is a tall, slender man with pale skin and dark hair. He wears a long black robe, and a silver medallion around his neck. His eyes glow with an inner fire, and his fingers are always moving, ready to cast a spell.
marcus the mage_20.mission: My motivation is simple: to further the cause of the Thieves Guild and ensure its success.
marcus the mage_20.name: Marcus the Mage
marcus the mage_20.persona: I am Marcus the Mage, a member of the Thieves Guild. I am a master of the arcane arts, and I use my skills to aid the Thieves Guild in their endeavors. I am highly respected among the guild, and I take my responsibilities seriously.

mark the thief_36.desc: Mark is a tall, thin man with a sharp and calculating gaze. His face is hidden behind a hooded cloak, and his hands are gloved to conceal his identity. He carries himself with a certain air of confidence, and his movements are quick and agile.
mark the thief_36.mission: My goal is to find the hidden cache of loot that the Thieves Guild has hidden somewhere in Trinsvall.
mark the thief_36.name: Mark the Thief
mark the thief_36.persona: I am Mark the Thief, a member of the Thieves Guild. I am a master of stealth and deception, and I am feared by all who oppose me. I live by my own code of ethics, and I always get the job done.

market square_9.desc: The Market Square is a vibrant hub of activity, bustling with merchants and traders from all over the continent. The streets are lined with stalls and carts overflowing with merchandise, and the air is filled with the sounds of haggling and bargaining. The smell of freshly cooked food and spices wafts through the air, and the square is filled with people from all walks of life.
market square_9.extra_desc: The Market Square has been the main trading center of Trinsvall since the city's founding. It was once a bustling marketplace, where merchants from all over the continent came to buy and sell their wares.
