However, since the rise of the Thieves Guild, the Market Square has become a shadow of its former glory. The Thieves Guild has imposed strict regulations and heavy taxes on the merchants, and the citizens of Trinsvall live in fear of their rule.
market square_9.name: Market Square

apothecary_11.examine_desc: The path winds its way past colorful stalls and vendors before opening up to a narrow cobblestone path that leads towards the Apothecary. A few scattered lanterns provide light to the otherwise dark and mysterious route.
apothecary_11.label: a narrow cobblestone path leading to the Apothecary

blacksmith_13.examine_desc: The path winds through the bustling market, leading away from the stalls and carts and towards the distant sounds of clanging metal.
blacksmith_13.label: a path leading to the Blacksmith

inn_14.examine_desc: A narrow cobblestone path leads through the market, winding its way towards the Inn in the distance. The path is lined with tall street lamps, casting a warm glow on the bustling market around it. The Inn can be seen in the distance, the soft light of its windows beckoning you closer.
inn_14.label: a cobblestone path leading to the Inn

library_12.examine_desc: A wide cobblestone path runs from the Market Square, winding through the city and eventually leading to the imposing Library at the center of town.
library_12.label: a cobblestone path leading to the Library

stables_10.examine_desc: A wide cobblestone path meanders out of the Market Square, heading towards a small wooden structure in the distance - the Stables. The path is lined with merchants and traders hawking their goods, and the air is filled with the sounds of horses and carts.
stables_10.label: a wide cobblestone path leading to the Stables

mining hammer_154.desc: This mining hammer is made from sturdy metal and is designed for breaking through rocks and other tough surfaces. It is heavy and not ideal for use in combat, but it is a useful tool for mining and excavation.
mining hammer_154.name: mining hammer

mining tool_166.desc: This mining tool is made of sturdy metal, with a sharp point and a flat edge. It is designed to be used to mine ore and other minerals from the ground.
mining tool_166.name: mining tool

noran, the guard_56.desc: Noran is a tall and wiry figure, dressed in a leather breastplate and a chainmail tunic. He has a stern expression on his face, and his gaze is vigilant. He wears a sword at his hip and a shield on his arm.
noran, the guard_56.mission: My goal is to protect the Stables at all costs and ensure that the people of Trinsvall can travel safely and securely.
noran, the guard_56.name: Noran, the guard
noran, the guard_56.persona: I am Noran, the guard. I am strong and loyal, and I take my job protecting the Stables seriously. I have been here for many years, and I know this place like the back of my hand. I am always ready to put my life on the line for the safety of others.

olaf the smith_65.desc: Olaf is a young man, with a strong build and a determined expression. He is dressed in simple clothes, with a leather apron and a set of tools at his side. His hands are calloused from years of hammering and shaping metal, and his eyes are always focused on his work.
olaf the smith_65.mission: My goal is to become the best smith in Trinsvall, and to craft the finest weapons and armor that the city has ever seen.
olaf the smith_65.name: Olaf the Smith
olaf the smith_65.persona: I am Olaf the Smith, apprentice to Kallen. I have a strong passion for metalworking, and I take great pride in crafting weapons and armor for the citizens of Trinsvall. I learn new techniques and hone my skills every day, and I am determined to one day be as skilled as my master.

old man behind the counter_58.desc: An old man, with a white beard and balding head, stands behind the counter of the Apothecary. He has a kindly face, and his eyes twinkle with wisdom.
old man behind the counter_58.mission: My goal is to help people find what they need and to make sure they have the knowledge they need to make the right decisions.
old man behind the counter_58.name: old man behind the counter
old man behind the counter_58.persona: I am an old man, owner of the Apothecary. I have been in this business for many years, and I know the secrets of the herbs and potions that I sell. I am wise and knowledgeable, and I am always happy to help customers find what they need.

orb of trinsvall_135.desc: This mysterious orb is smooth and translucent, and pulses with a strange, magical light. It is believed to be able to grant its holder great power.
orb of trinsvall_135.name: Orb of Trinsvall

oren, the merchant_57.desc: Oren is a tall, lean man, his face hidden beneath a thick, dark beard. He wears a long, brown coat, with many pockets and a wide-brimmed hat. He carries a large leather satchel, filled with coins and documents.
oren, the merchant_57.mission: My goal is to make the most of my opportunities and become the wealthiest merchant in the city.
oren, the merchant_57.name: Oren, the merchant
oren, the merchant_57.persona: I'm Oren the merchant. I'm a hustler, always looking for the next opportunity. I have a nose for deals, and I'm always ready to haggle for a good price. My word is my bond, and I'll do whatever it takes to get the job done.

ornate shop_152.desc: This ornate shop is a sight to behold. It has intricate and delicate designs carved into the walls and fixtures, and is filled with luxurious items from far away lands. It's a reminder of the city's former grandeur before the Thieves Guild came to power.
ornate shop_152.name: Ornate Shop

pastry_224.desc: This pastry is round and flaky, filled with a sweet custard and topped with a dusting of powdered sugar. It looks like something you would find in a bakery.
pastry_224.name: pastry

patchwork cloak_229.desc: This patchwork cloak is colorful and bright, and appears to be made up of scraps of fabric from a variety of different sources. It looks like it could keep you warm in cold weather.
patchwork cloak_229.name: patchwork cloak

pen and notepad_308.desc: This pen and notepad set is perfect for keeping track of all the important information you'll need to find the Thieves Guild's hidden loot. The pen is thin and slick, while the notepad is filled with blank pages.
pen and notepad_308.name: pen and notepad

pickaxe_153.desc: This pickaxe is made from strong metal and is surprisingly light for its size. It is designed for breaking through solid rock and has a wooden handle for easy grip.
pickaxe_153.name: pickaxe

pickaxe_162.desc: This large and heavy pickaxe is made of sturdy metal and is well suited for mining. The handle is wrapped in a thick leather for a better grip.
pickaxe_162.name: pickaxe

piece of broken furniture_217.desc: This piece of broken furniture looks like it was once a chair or table. It has been smashed to pieces and is completely unusable.
piece of broken furniture_217.name: piece of broken furniture

piece of rubble_219.desc: This piece of rubble is broken and jagged, and would likely be difficult to hold. It is covered in dust and dirt, and it looks like it was once part of a much larger structure.
piece of rubble_219.name: piece of rubble

plain black robe_216.desc: This plain black robe is made of thick fabric, and is designed to keep the wearer warm and protected. It has a hood and a sash that can be used to tie the robe closed.
plain black robe_216.name: plain black robe

plain brown dress_246.desc: This plain brown dress is made of simple cotton fabric and is not very ornate. It looks like it could be easily worn, but won't provide much protection in a fight.
plain brown dress_246.name: plain brown dress

plain white tunic_245.desc: This plain white tunic is made of lightweight fabric, and would make a comfortable piece of clothing to wear.
plain white tunic_245.name: plain white tunic

polished boot_239.desc: This polished boot is made of leather and has a glossy finish. Its intricate stitching and unique design make it stand out among other boots.
polished boot_239.name: polished boot

pouch_170.desc: This small pouch is filled with coins of various denominations. The coins jingle when the pouch is moved, and the material it is made from is of high quality.
pouch_170.name: pouch

rapier_136.desc: This slender and lightweight rapier is designed for thrusting and piercing attacks. It is surprisingly sharp and well-crafted, likely forged by a master smith.
rapier_136.name: rapier

rapier_146.desc: This rapier is finely crafted, with a smooth handle and a sharp blade. It appears to be of high quality, and could be used to great effect in a duel.
rapier_146.name: rapier

rapier_272.desc: This rapier is light and sharp, perfect for quick thrusts and jabs. It appears to be of high quality and is likely from the local armory.
rapier_272.name: rapier

rare relic_182.desc: This rare relic is made of an unknown material and is covered in mysterious runes. It is heavy and solid, and appears to be of great value.
rare relic_182.name: rare relic

red cape_105.desc: This red cape is long and flowing, and is made of a soft material. It appears to be a nobleman's cape, and is adorned with intricate embroidery along its edges.
red cape_105.name: red cape

reginald the mage_32.desc: Reginald the Mage is an imposing figure, standing tall and broad-shouldered. He wears a long black robe, and his face is hidden by an ornate mask. He carries a staff in one hand and a large tome of ancient spells in the other.
reginald the mage_32.mission: My goal is to become the most powerful mage in Trinsvall, and to use my magic to gain control of the city and its citizens. I seek to use the Orb of Trinsvall to become even more powerful, and to use its power to further my own ambitions.
reginald the mage_32.name: Reginald the Mage
reginald the mage_32.persona: I am Reginald the Mage, a member of the Thieves Guild in the Golden Quarter of Trinsvall. I am a master of the arcane arts, and I wield powerful magic in my pursuit of power and wealth. I am cunning and calculating, and I use my skills to outwit and defeat my enemies.

reynold the loyal soldier_16.desc: Reynold stands tall and imposing, his broad shoulders and muscular frame marked by years of combat experience. He wears a suit of steel armor, gauntlets and a helm, and carries a heavy wooden shield and a longsword at his side. His eyes are cold and piercing, and his jaw is set in a determined expression.
reynold the loyal soldier_16.mission: My goal is to protect and serve the Thieves' Guild with unwavering loyalty and dedication. I will do whatever it takes to ensure that the Thieves' Guild remains in power, and that its members are safe and secure.
reynold the loyal soldier_16.name: Reynold the Loyal Soldier
reynold the loyal soldier_16.persona: I am Reynold the Loyal Soldier, a warrior in the Thieves' Guild's army. I take great pride in my service and have sworn an oath to protect and serve the Thieves' Guild to the best of my abilities. I am an experienced fighter and a master of weapons, having trained for many years in the art of battle. I am disciplined and obedient, and I never back down from a challenge.

rhys, the horse trader_53.desc: Rhys is a tall, broad-shouldered man with a good-natured face, a thick brown beard, and a broad smile that can easily disarm even the most hardened of adversaries. He is well-dressed in fine clothing, and his boots are always polished to a shine.
rhys, the horse trader_53.mission: My goal is to make a living by trading and selling horses in Trinsvall, and to become well-respected in the city for my expertise in the trade.
rhys, the horse trader_53.name: Rhys, the Horse Trader
rhys, the horse trader_53.persona: I am Rhys the Horse Trader, a merchant of the finest steeds in all of Trinsvall. I have made a living trading and selling horses since I was a young lad, and have become well-known throughout the city for my expertise and skill in the trade. I am a shrewd negotiator and am not easily fooled by false promises or empty talk.

robe_263.desc: This robe is made of a coarse, rough fabric, and is a deep, dark indigo color. It is long and full, and seems to be made for someone of large stature.
robe_263.name: robe

robe_99.desc: This long, flowing robe is made of a thick, luxurious fabric that feels smooth and comfortable to the touch. It has intricate embroidery on the shoulders and cuffs that make it look quite regal and expensive.
robe_99.name: robe

rufus the guard_46.desc: Rufus is a tall, muscular man with a stern expression on his face. He is clad in a suit of armor, a sword at his belt, and a crossbow in his hands. His eyes are sharp, alert, and focused.
rufus the guard_46.mission: My goal is to serve the Thieves Guild with loyalty and dedication, and to ensure that the citizens of Trinsvall abide by the rules set by the Guild.
rufus the guard_46.name: Rufus the Guard
rufus the guard_46.persona: I am Rufus the Guard, a loyal member of the Thieves Guild that rules Trinsvall. I have been trained in the art of combat and stealth and I am an expert in wielding a variety of weapons. I am a fierce warrior, ready to fight for the Thieves Guild at a moment's notice. I am a man of honor, dedicated to protecting the interests of the Guild and ensuring that the citizens of Trinsvall obey the rules.

ruins of the castle_8.desc: The ruins of the castle are a haunting reminder of Trinsvall's past. The once-grand structure is now a pile of rubble and broken stone, but its walls still stand tall. Inside the ruins, there are still a few pieces of furniture and decorations from the castle's glory days. The air is heavy with a sense of dread, and the shadows seem to linger longer here than in the rest of the city.
ruins of the castle_8.extra_desc: The ruins of the castle once housed the powerful rulers of the city of Trinsvall. It was here that the city was founded and grew to become a prosperous trading hub. But eventually, the rulers of the city were overcome by a long period of bitter strife between the various guilds, and the Thieves Guild emerged as the victor. Since then, they have taken control over the city and made the castle their headquarters. The castle has been in disrepair ever since, a reminder of the power the Thieves Guild wields over the city.
ruins of the castle_8.name: Ruins of the Castle

abandoned mineshaft_5.examine_desc: A winding, broken path leads away from the ruins of the castle, disappearing into the darkness of the Abandoned Mineshaft. A few weeds and rocks litter the trail, hinting at its age, and the silence of the night only adds to the eerie atmosphere.
abandoned mineshaft_5.label: a broken path leading to the mineshaft

golden quarter_4.examine_desc: An old stone path winds its way through the ruins, leading towards the Golden Quarter. The path is overgrown with weeds and wildflowers, and the stones are cracked and crumbling. Despite its disrepair, the path is still clearly visible, and it beckons adventurers towards the Golden Quarter.
golden quarter_4.label: an old stone path leading to Golden Quarter

hidden vault_7.examine_desc: An old doorway, tucked away in the corner of the ruins, leads inwards towards the Hidden Vault. The door is creaky, and the hinges are covered in rust. The path beyond the doorway is dark and foreboding, and the air is charged with a sense of mystery.
hidden vault_7.label: an old doorway leading to the Hidden Vault

secret cave_6.examine_desc: The ruins of the castle are connected to a mysterious cave by an ancient, forgotten path. The path is made of crumbling stones and overgrown with weeds and wild vegetation, and stretches into the darkness beyond the castle walls.
secret cave_6.label: an ancient, forgotten path

rune_200.desc: This rune is inscribed into the wall, and appears to be glowing faintly. It is clearly magical in nature and looks like it could be used to open a portal of some kind.
rune_200.name: rune

rusty mining cart_165.desc: This rusty mining cart is large and bulky, with a flat bottom and two wide wheels that are slightly wobbly. It looks like it's seen better days, but it could still be useful for carrying heavy loads.
rusty mining cart_165.name: rusty mining cart

sack_161.desc: This sack is filled with various supplies, from food and water to tools and weapons. It looks like it could be used for carrying large amounts of items.
sack_161.name: sack

sack_319.desc: This is a small, canvas sack. It looks sturdy and well-made, with a drawstring closure.
sack_319.name: sack

saddle_237.desc: This saddle is made of leather, and is well crafted and comfortable. It is designed to fit a variety of horses, and would be perfect for long journeys.
saddle_237.name: saddle

saddlebag_235.desc: This saddlebag is made of sturdy leather and is filled with various pockets and compartments. It has buckles and straps for attaching to a horse or other animal.
saddlebag_235.name: saddlebag

salazar the thief_18.desc: Salazar is a tall, dark-haired man with a long, pointed beard and deep-set eyes. He wears a hooded cloak and carries a long, curved dagger at his side.
salazar the thief_18.mission: My goal is to make sure that the Thieves Guild maintains its power and influence in Trinsvall, and that we are able to acquire the wealth and resources that we need to survive.
salazar the thief_18.name: Salazar the Thief
salazar the thief_18.persona: I'm Salazar the Thief, the leader of the Thieves Guild. I'm a master of stealth and deception, and I will do whatever it takes to make sure that my Guild is the most powerful in Trinsvall. I'm not afraid to use force when necessary, and I'm always willing to take risks in order to get what I want.

satchel_311.desc: This large, leather satchel is filled to the brim with goods and wares. It has a sturdy strap, making it easy to carry, and looks like it could hold quite a lot of items.
satchel_311.name: satchel

scimitar_175.desc: This scimitar is curved and gleaming, with a razor-sharp edge that could cut through most materials with ease. It appears to have been crafted with expert skill.
scimitar_175.name: scimitar

secret cave_6.desc: The Secret Cave is a mysterious chamber located deep within the Hidden Loot Cache. It is filled with rare artifacts and relics, the likes of which are unknown to most people. The walls of the cave are lined with ancient hieroglyphics and strange symbols, and the air is heavy with the smell of damp stone. A faint light can be seen emanating from the depths of the cave, and an eerie atmosphere pervades the atmosphere.
secret cave_6.extra_desc: The Secret Cave was once an ancient temple, believed to have been built by an unknown civilization long before the rise of the Thieves Guild. It is said to contain powerful artifacts that could provide the holder with great power, and the Thieves Guild has been searching for these artifacts for many years. The entrance to the cave is well-guarded by the Thieves Guild, as they do not want anyone to discover the powerful artifacts that are hidden within.
secret cave_6.name: Secret Cave

abandoned mineshaft_5.examine_desc: An ancient passageway made of stone leads away from the Secret Cave, winding deeper into the darkness. The walls are covered in cobwebs and ancient symbols, and a chill draft wafts through the air. The faint glow of distant torches can be seen from the entrance, indicating the presence of the Abandoned Mineshaft.
abandoned mineshaft_5.label: an old passageway leading to an Abandoned Mineshaft

hidden vault_7.examine_desc: An ancient tunnel, carved from the wall of the cave, stretches out into the darkness. Its entrance is marked by a crudely carved doorway that leads further into the depths of the Hidden Loot Cache.
hidden vault_7.label: an ancient tunnel leading to Hidden Vault

ruins of the castle_8.examine_desc: A narrow tunnel, barely illuminated by a few flickering torches, leads away from the Secret Cave. It snakes through the darkness, twisting and turning until it eventually opens up into the ruins of a castle.
ruins of the castle_8.label: a dark tunnel leading to the Ruins of the Castle

container_node.target_id: thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains_24

shabby clothing_115.desc: This set of clothing looks worn and tattered, but could still provide some warmth and protection from the elements. It appears to be from the local district.
shabby clothing_115.name: shabby clothing

shackle_114.desc: This shackle is made of cold steel and has a heavy chain attached. It looks like it could be used to restrain someone.
shackle_114.name: shackle

container_node.target_id: thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains_24

shackle_116.desc: This shackle is made of cold iron and is heavy and strong. It is connected to a long, thick chain, also of cold iron.
shackle_116.name: shackle

shackle_117.desc: This shackle is made of cold, hard metal, and looks like it could be used to restrain someone. It appears to be a part of a larger chain.
shackle_117.name: shackle

shackle_118.desc: This shackle is made of cold, hard metal and is designed to keep someone securely in place. The accompanying chain is just as sturdy, and could be used to restrict movement even further.
shackle_118.name: shackle

shelf_265.desc: This shelf is lined with strange herbs and potions that seem to be of magical origin. The glass bottles and jars are labeled with mysterious symbols and contain a variety of colors and smells.
shelf_265.name: Shelf

shelf_278.desc: This shelf is made of sturdy wood and is adorned with many books and scrolls from all corners of the world. It's filled with knowledge from faraway lands and could prove to be a valuable source of information.
shelf_278.name: shelf

shield_249.desc: This shield is made from heavy metal and is covered in intricate designs. It is large enough to provide ample protection from incoming attacks and is sure to be a valuable asset in battle.
shield_249.name: shield

container_node.target_id: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67

shield_296.desc: This large shield is made of sturdy metal and is designed to protect the bearer from incoming attacks. It looks to be from the local armory.
shield_296.name: shield

shield_74.desc: This sturdy shield is made of metal and is embossed with the insignia of the Thieves Guild. It's large enough to protect you from most physical attacks, but light enough to carry without too much effort.
shield_74.name: shield

silver medallion_100.desc: This silver medallion is intricate and detailed, with a stylized design of a winged dragon etched into its surface. It is possible that it is of great value.
silver medallion_100.name: silver medallion

smart shirt_306.desc: This smart shirt is made of a lightweight but sturdy fabric, with several pockets and a stylish design. It appears to be perfect for a night out on the town.
smart shirt_306.name: smart shirt

smoke bomb_193.desc: This smoke bomb is small and round, with a fuse on top. When lit, it will emit a thick cloud of smoke that obscures vision.
smoke bomb_193.name: smoke bomb

smoke bomb_85.desc: This small, round bomb emits a thick black smoke when activated. It's the perfect tool for a quick escape or distraction.
smoke bomb_85.name: smoke bomb

stables_10.desc: The Stables are bustling with activity, the sound of horses whinnying and carriages clattering filling the air. Inside, there are a variety of horses, carriages, and tack, all ready to be used for transport throughout the city. The walls are lined with stalls, and the air is heavy with the smell of hay and leather.
stables_10.extra_desc: The Stables were originally built to house the horses and carriages used by the royal family of Trinsvall. After the Thieves Guild took control of the city, they converted the stables into a hub of transport throughout the city, using the carriages to move goods and supplies. The stables are now a vital part of the city's infrastructure, and the Thieves Guild guard it heavily to ensure no one attempts to use it for their own ends.
stables_10.name: Stables

inn_14.examine_desc: The cobblestone path stretches out before you, leading to the Inn in the distance. The path is lined with lanterns, and you can see the lights of the Inn twinkling in the distance.
inn_14.label: a cobblestone path leading to the Inn

market square_9.examine_desc: A wide cobblestone path leads away from the stables, winding its way towards the bustling market square in the distance.
market square_9.label: path to Market Square

staff_141.desc: This staff is made of polished wood and is about half the height of a grown adult. It is surprisingly light and could be wielded with ease.
staff_141.name: staff

staff_184.desc: This staff is made of a sturdy wood and is intricately carved with magical symbols. It is topped with a sparkling crystal that seems to reflect the light.
staff_184.name: staff

staff_320.desc: This staff is made of dark wood and is intricately carved with runes and symbols. It is smooth to the touch, and has a comforting weight in the hand.
staff_320.name: staff

staff_97.desc: This staff is tall and made of sturdy wood, and has intricate markings carved into it. It appears to be an ancient artifact, and crackles with a mysterious energy.
staff_97.name: staff

stall_240.desc: This stall is overflowing with merchandise and goods of all sorts, likely from merchants across the continent. It is made of wood and is quite sturdy, with plenty of space to fit many items.
stall_240.name: stall

stall_260.desc: This stall is a wooden structure with a countertop, used to display merchandise for sale. It appears to be well-constructed and sturdy.
stall_260.name: stall

stone_168.desc: This stone is jagged and rough, and looks like it was chipped off of a larger piece of rubble. It seems to have been discarded in the street.
stone_168.name: stone

sturdy leather boot_247.desc: This sturdy leather boot is perfect for long journeys. Its thick leather material is designed to protect the foot from the elements and any obstacles encountered on the road.
sturdy leather boot_247.name: sturdy leather boot

suit of armor_209.desc: This suit of armor is made of metal and reinforced with leather straps. It looks to be from the armory of the Thieves Guild, and would offer excellent protection in combat.
suit of armor_209.name: suit of armor

suit of steel armor_79.desc: This suit of steel armor is heavy and sturdy, and would make a formidable defense against any attack. It seems to be from the armory of the Thieves Guild.
suit of steel armor_79.name: suit of steel armor

sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.desc: Sven the Warrior was a tall and broad-shouldered man, clad in a suit of gleaming steel armor. He had a strong jaw and a hardened look in his eyes, and carried a large sword and shield.
sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.mission: My goal is to free Trinsvall from the rule of the Thieves Guild, and to restore justice and peace to the city.
sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.name: Sven the Warrior defending Trinsvall from the Thieves Guild
names: Sven the Warrior defending Trinsvall from the Thieves Guild
sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.node_id: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67
sven the warrior defending trinsvall fro.persona: I am Sven the Warrior, and I have taken up arms to defend the city of Trinsvall from the oppressive rule of the Thieves Guild. I am a master in the art of combat, trained in the use of numerous weapons and armor. I am brave and determined, and I will not rest until justice is restored in Trinsvall.

sword_103.desc: This sword is long and thin, with a sharp blade and a hilt that is well-worn from use. It is lightweight and easy to wield, making it a handy weapon in a fight.
sword_103.name: sword

sword_111.desc: This sword is sharp and heavy, and is clearly crafted for battle. Its blade is strong and its hilt is sturdy, making it an ideal weapon for combat.
sword_111.name: sword

sword_121.desc: This sword is heavy and imposing. It has a sharpened blade, and a hilt made of finely crafted leather.
sword_121.name: Sword

sword_177.desc: This sword is sharp and heavy, and could likely do a lot of damage if swung. Don't swing it at anything important! It appears to be from the local armory.
sword_177.name: sword

sword_206.desc: This sword is made of a mysterious dark metal, and is surprisingly light despite its size. The hilt is wrapped in a black leather grip with silver inlays, and the blade is etched with strange symbols.
sword_206.name: Sword

sword_210.desc: This sword is long and sharp, with a gleaming steel blade and a sturdy hilt. It looks like it could do considerable damage if wielded properly.
sword_210.name: Sword

sword_248.desc: This sword is heavy and gleams with a menacing edge. It appears to be of fine craftsmanship, likely from the armory of the Thieves Guild.
sword_248.name: Sword

container_node.target_id: sven the warrior defending trinsvall from the thieves guild_67

sword_297.desc: This sword is sharp and well-crafted, with an intricate design along the hilt. It appears to have been taken from the local armory.
sword_297.name: Sword

sword_73.desc: This sword is a long and heavy weapon, with a sharp blade and a sturdy hilt. It appears to have been crafted in the armory of the Thieves Guild.
sword_73.name: Sword

tack_259.desc: This small, sharp tack is made of metal and looks like it could be used to affix something to a surface.
tack_259.name: tack

tapestry_110.desc: This tapestry is made of a rich, luxurious fabric and is intricately designed with detailed patterns and images. It appears to be from the local armory and is likely very valuable.
tapestry_110.name: tapestry

tapestry_218.desc: This tapestry is made from a rich fabric and is decorated with intricate patterns and symbols. It is likely an expensive and rare item, as it appears to be from the Thieves Guild's armory.
tapestry_218.name: tapestry

tapestry_323.desc: This tapestry is intricately woven with a variety of colorful threads. It appears to depict a scene from a long-forgotten time.
tapestry_323.name: tapestry

thalia the rogue_43.desc: Thalia is a slim, athletic figure, with long dark hair and piercing green eyes. She wears a black hooded cloak, and carries a variety of tools and weapons on her belt.
thalia the rogue_43.mission: My goal is to uncover the hidden treasures of the Thieves Guild, and use them to gain power and wealth.
thalia the rogue_43.name: Thalia the Rogue
thalia the rogue_43.persona: I'm a master of stealth and deception, and I'm not afraid to take risks if it means I can get what I want. I'm a member of the Thieves Guild, and I know how to use my skills to my advantage. I'm daring, resourceful, and relentless in pursuit of my goals.

thick glove_131.desc: This thick glove is made of thick, durable leather and is designed to protect the wearer's hands from sharp objects and dangerous environments.
thick glove_131.name: thick glove

thick stone wall_120.desc: This thick stone wall is made of cold, dark gray blocks of stone, and is at least several feet thick. It appears to be very sturdy and difficult to penetrate.
thick stone wall_120.name: thick stone wall

thief guild member_71.desc: The Thief Guild Member is cloaked and hooded, their face hidden in the shadows. They hold a dagger in one hand, and a crossbow slung over the shoulder.
thief guild member_71.mission: My goal is to protect the Thieves Guild, and to make sure that our organization remains in control of the city of Trinsvall.
thief guild member_71.name: Thief Guild Member
thief guild member_71.persona: I am a member of the Thieves Guild, an organization that has been ruling the city of Trinsvall since the end of the factional strife. I'm a master of stealth and deception, and I'm feared by all who oppose me. I'm loyal to the Shadow, the leader of the Thieves Guild, and I am willing to do whatever it takes to protect him and our organization.

thief jorin, shackled and chained_23.desc: Jorin is a small and scrawny figure, with a face full of determination and a will of iron. He is shackled and chained, but his eyes still hold a glimmer of hope.
thief jorin, shackled and chained_23.mission: My sole motivation is to escape this place, and to get revenge on the Thieves' Guild for imprisoning me here.
thief jorin, shackled and chained_23.name: Thief Jorin, shackled and chained
thief jorin, shackled and chained_23.persona: I am Thief Jorin, shackled and chained in the dungeon of the Thieves' Guild. I have been here for what feels like an eternity, and I am determined to find a way out. I am cunning and resourceful, and I will use whatever means necessary to escape and exact revenge on the Thieves' Guild.

thief kael, shackled and chained_25.desc: Thief Kael is a small and slight figure, with a look of determination in his eyes. His hands are bound in shackles and chains, and he shuffles slowly through the hallways of the dungeon.
thief kael, shackled and chained_25.mission: My ultimate goal is to escape from the Thieves' Guild and reclaim my freedom.
thief kael, shackled and chained_25.name: Thief Kael, shackled and chained
thief kael, shackled and chained_25.persona: I am Thief Kael, a master of stealth and deception. I have been captured and imprisoned by the Thieves' Guild, and am shackled and chained in the depths of their dungeon. Despite my captivity, I remain hopeful that one day I will escape and reclaim my freedom.

thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.desc: A tall, slender woman with auburn hair and a determined set to her jaw. She wears a shabby set of clothing, her hands and feet shackled in heavy chains. Her eyes are full of fire and her gaze is fierce.
thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.mission: My ultimate goal is to regain my freedom and escape the clutches of the Thieves Guild. I will use all of my skills and abilities to do whatever it takes to achieve this goal.
thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.name: Thief Keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains
names: Thief Keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains
thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.node_id: thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and chains_24
thief keira, imprisoned in shackles and.persona: I am Thief Keira, a master of stealth and deception. I have been captured and imprisoned in shackles and chains by the Thieves Guild, but I will not go down without a fight. I have a sharp wit and cunning mind that I will use to my advantage. I will use whatever means necessary to regain my freedom and break free of these oppressive bonds.

tiberius the scholar_48.desc: Tiberius the Scholar is an unassuming figure, with a gaunt face and piercing blue eyes. He wears a plain black robe, cinched at the waist with a leather belt, and carries a large book in his hands. His movements are swift and sure, his gaze always on the lookout for any danger.
tiberius the scholar_48.mission: My goal is to discover the truth behind the Thieves Guild's actions and to bring justice to the people of Trinsvall.
tiberius the scholar_48.name: Tiberius the Scholar
tiberius the scholar_48.persona: I am Tiberius the Scholar. I was once a respected member of the Trinsvall court, but I was forced to flee the city when the Thieves Guild rose to power. I have since dedicated my life to the pursuit of knowledge, seeking out the hidden secrets of the city and its dark past. I am a master of stealth and deception, and I use my skills to uncover the mysteries of Trinsvall and to protect its citizens from the Thieves Guild's tyranny.

tom the miner_35.desc: Tom is a rugged looking man, with a strong and toned physique. He wears a leather apron, and his hands and face are covered with dirt and dust from his years of toiling away in the mines.
tom the miner_35.mission: To restore Trinsvall to its former glory and rid it of the Thieves Guild's oppressive rule.
tom the miner_35.name: Tom the Miner
tom the miner_35.persona: I am Tom the Miner, formerly a miner of Trinsvall. I have seen the city in its better days, and the Thieves Guild's rule has ushered in a new age of fear and oppression. I must do whatever it takes to restore Trinsvall to its former glory.

tome_142.desc: This tome is made from thick, leather-bound pages, and appears to be quite old. It is filled with arcane symbols and ancient spells, and it looks like it would take a great deal of study to understand the contents.
tome_142.name: tome

tome_185.desc: This large tome is filled with pages of ancient magical knowledge. The cover is made of leather, and the pages are filled with arcane symbols and diagrams.
tome_185.name: tome

tome_279.desc: This tome is old and dusty, with pages that are yellowed with age. It looks like it has been around for a long time, and the words on its pages are barely legible. It appears to be one of the many tomes that line the walls of the library.
tome_279.name: tome

tong_281.desc: These tongs are made of iron, and have long handles with a pair of pincers at the end. They can be used to grab and hold items without burning your hands.
tong_281.name: tong

tongs_231.desc: These tongs are made of metal, and have two curved ends that can be used to pick up or hold objects. They are perfect for grabbing small objects without touching them.
tongs_231.name: tongs

tongs_286.desc: This pair of tongs is made of metal, with a long handle and two prongs at the end. They are well made and useful for gripping and manipulating small objects.
tongs_286.name: tongs

tongs_291.desc: These tongs are made of metal and have two long handles that come to a point at the end. They are perfect for holding and manipulating objects.
tongs_291.name: tongs

torkin the warrior_44.desc: Torkin is a rugged warrior, standing tall and proud. He is clad in heavy armor, and wields a massive two-handed axe. His face is stern but determined, and his eyes are sharp and alert.
torkin the warrior_44.mission: My goal is to protect the Thieves Guild, and to ensure its continued power and prosperity.
torkin the warrior_44.name: Torkin the Warrior
torkin the warrior_44.persona: I am Torkin the Warrior, a loyal member of the Thieves Guild. I have been trained in the arts of combat and am more than capable of taking on any foe. I am a master of strategy, and I use my skills to outwit my enemies and gain the upper hand in any situation. I have a strong sense of justice, and I will fight for what is right no matter the cost.

traveler_72.desc: The traveler had a wild, unkempt appearance, with wild hair, a ragged cloak and a look of determination in their eyes. They carried a large sack over their shoulder, and a staff in their hand.
traveler_72.mission: My goal is to explore the world, experience new cultures and uncover secrets and mysteries that have been lost to time.
traveler_72.name: traveler
traveler_72.persona: I am a traveler, an explorer who seeks out new lands and new experiences. I have seen much of the world and seek to explore even more. I am brave and daring, and never shy away from a challenge.

tray_303.desc: This tray is made of polished metal, and is filled with an array of different drinks. It is large enough to hold multiple drinks, so you can easily share with your friends.
tray_303.name: tray

tray_307.desc: This metal tray is light and thin, and has a few small indentations in the surface. It's useful for serving food and drinks, and can also be used as a makeshift carrying container.
tray_307.name: tray

trousers_289.desc: These trousers are made of heavy, durable fabric and feature several pockets. They provide adequate protection against the elements and would keep most adventurers warm in colder climates.
trousers_289.name: trousers

tunic_288.desc: This short-sleeved tunic is made of thick, sturdy fabric, with a large hood that could help protect the wearer from the elements. It appears to be from the local armory.
tunic_288.name: tunic

two-handed axe_197.desc: This two-handed axe is crafted from a sturdy metal and is highly ornate. It has a long handle and a wide, curved blade. It would take a skilled warrior to wield it effectively.
two-handed axe_197.name: two-handed axe

uniform_309.desc: This uniform is made of thick cloth and is adorned with the insignia of the Thieves Guild. It is a deep, dark color that almost blends in with the shadows. It is long-sleeved and has several pockets for storing items.
uniform_309.name: uniform

vex the thief_42.desc: Vex is a tall, wiry figure with a sharp gaze and a devious smirk. He wears a cloak of shadows that obscures his features, and a hood that casts a long shadow over his face. He carries a pair of curved daggers at his belt, and a crossbow on his back.
vex the thief_42.mission: My goal is to keep my guild in power and continue to plunder the city of Trinsvall.
vex the thief_42.name: Vex the Thief
vex the thief_42.persona: I am Vex the Thief, leader of the Thieves Guild. I am a master of stealth and deception, and no one dares oppose me. I have the power to bring chaos and destruction upon my enemies, and I will do whatever it takes to ensure that my guild remains in power.

waistcoat_304.desc: This brown waistcoat is made of wool, and has a few pockets on the front. It is well-made and looks warm and comfortable.
waistcoat_304.name: waistcoat

watcher_60.desc: The Watcher stands tall and imposing in the center of the room, shrouded in a long, dark cloak and wearing a hood that obscures their features.
watcher_60.mission: To protect the secrets of the Library and to ensure that the knowledge contained within its walls is preserved for all eternity.
watcher_60.name: Watcher
watcher_60.persona: I am the silent guardian of this sacred library, a silent witness to the secrets hidden within its walls. I have been here for as long as I can remember, and I will remain here for many more years to come. I am the keeper of knowledge, and I will protect the secrets within these books and scrolls for all eternity.

weapon or tool_243.desc: This weapon or tool is made of metal, and is likely used for combat or construction. It appears to be from the local armory and is very well made.
weapon or tool_243.name: weapon or tool

weapon_132.desc: This weapon appears to be crafted from a sturdy metal, and is heavy in the hand. Though its purpose is unclear, it could certainly be used to cause a lot of damage.
weapon_132.name: weapon

weapon_199.desc: This weapon is incredibly powerful and intimidating, and seems to be made of an unknown material. It is highly durable and could easily do a great deal of damage if wielded.
weapon_199.name: weapon

white apron_305.desc: This plain white apron is made of linen and is likely used in the local armory. It is quite thin and lightweight, and could be worn by a person.
white apron_305.name: white apron

wide-brimmed hat_257.desc: This wide-brimmed hat is made of a soft, light material and has a wide, floppy brim that shades the wearer from the sun. It is decorated with colorful stitching and a feather.
wide-brimmed hat_257.name: wide-brimmed hat

wide-brimmed hat_314.desc: This wide-brimmed hat is made of sturdy black felt, and is slightly misshapen from wear. It has a unique texture and is perfect for protecting one's head from the elements.
wide-brimmed hat_314.name: wide-brimmed hat

wooden shield_77.desc: This wooden shield is sturdy and well-crafted. It is large enough to protect you from most attacks and is painted with a colorful design.
wooden shield_77.name: wooden shield

worn-down boot_164.desc: This boot is worn-down and tattered, with a few holes in the sole. It's seen better days, but it looks like it could still be used for a bit of walking.
worn-down boot_164.name: worn-down boot

ylva the thief_66.desc: Ylva is a tall, slender figure with sharp features. She wears a dark cloak and hood to conceal her identity, and carries a pair of daggers at her belt. Her eyes are cold and calculating, and her movements are swift and silent.
ylva the thief_66.mission: My goal is to find the hidden cache of loot, and use it to gain power and influence in Trinsvall.
ylva the thief_66.name: Ylva the Thief
ylva the thief_66.persona: I am Ylva the Thief, a member of the Thieves Guild that controls the city of Trinsvall. I have a reputation for being a master of stealth and subterfuge, and I am feared by all who oppose me. My mission is to find the hidden cache of loot that the Thieves Guild is rumored to have stashed away.

zain, the blacksmith_52.desc: Zain is a strong and rugged man, with calloused hands and a hardened face. He wears a thick leather apron, and is covered in dust and soot from the forge. His dark eyes are full of determination, and his long black hair is tied back in a tight knot.
zain, the blacksmith_52.mission: My goal is to bring justice to the city of Trinsvall, and to protect its citizens from the oppressive rule of the Thieves Guild.
zain, the blacksmith_52.name: Zain, the blacksmith
zain, the blacksmith_52.persona: I am Zain, the blacksmith of Trinsvall. I am master of my craft, renowned for forging powerful weapons and armor. I have a strong sense of justice, and I am determined to protect the citizens of my city from the oppressive Thieves Guild.

title: This medieval city was once a wonder of the known world, until it fell prey to corruption amongst the guilds. Now the thieves guild rules supreme, plundering wealth from everywhere and redistributing it as they see fit.
